11.title: Homeless Girl ?

choices: Karen shoots up to 300ft tall (Mildly gentle)
Karen becomes 10,000ft tall (Consumed by power she lusts to destroy)
1111.content:
Karen, a young 7 year old homeless girl sat down at her usual "Post" right next to a coffee shop in the middle of winter. It was tough being a homeless orphan, why didn't she go somewhere? Because no where felt safe. Orphanages were run down and she wasn't really sure where else to try. Thus she turned to begging. It worked decently she often got enough change to get at least a little something to eat. She had long brown hair and green eyes, short at 4'6 and wear tattered blue jeans and a black turtle neck long sleeve shirt. She also had a light jacket which didn't help much. Thankfully her luck was about to change. The snow fell like a flurry, when just moments ago it was hardly even noticable. A woman in a white robe stood before her. Her face was pale and her eyes had a dark blue glow to them, oddly enough blue butterflies flew around her, how? Especially in the middle of winter. "I do not have money to gave you..." The woman's voice was motherly, like she was about to embrace Karen. "However...I require a vassal." Karen was silent, the butterflies were hypontic, she couldn't speak for a while.

"Like to take over?" Karen asked now afraid.

"No..." The woman paused. "To..." Her pause was longer this time and she seemed lost in thought. "Hmmm how to put this. I require a body, that of a female to fuse with, I will not be taking over your body nor will I be a voice in your head, I need your body to rest in, to recover my energy."

"By taking mine?" Karen asked feeling oddly at peace with this woman.

"No, think of it as curling up in a bed and falling asleep. I will gain energy through your emotions, the stronger they are the more I will recover and at a faster pace."

"What happens when you recover?" Karen asked tilting her head still oddly at peace, normally she'd be freaking out or calling this woman crazy and even the snow wasn't bothering her.

"I shall gain my true form and you my dear...will evolve to something better than human. For now though I request you take my hand. She offered her hand. "You'll never be cold again, nor will you be hungry or thirsty." That was enough for Karen, even if she wasn't under this woman's spell she'd have taken it, also being as young as she was, she didn't think twice. Taking her hand the woman vanished. Karen thought she had just dreamed it until...

((Note: Due to her age Karen's clothing WILL grow with her.))
1111.title: Growing up early

choices: Annabel pays a visit to some students who made fun of her
She decides to go on a smashing spree (Thus growing)
She decides to head to Mei's house.
112.content:
Annabel had it rough, really rough, as a child she was abandon on the streets of London, even the homeless population seemed to detest her, or maybe that was just her 13 year old mindset, school wasn't easy when she struggled to even look like a decent student. She did have a saving grace however. Another girl, Mei. Mei was older, in high school actually, likely around 17 or 18 she and her parents came from Japan. Their meeting was...interesting to say the least. It was a dark stormy night, and the rain was coming down hard, Annabel had no where to get out of the rain. Suddenly as if she were an angel Mei was just standing there in a nearby streetlight.

The dark haired, tall, long legged, brown eyed Asian seemed so regal, almost as if she were some kind of Empress in her walk. Annabel was awestruck as Mei approached. "Here you go." Mei held an umbrella using it to cover Annabel. "It rains a lot here doesn't it?" She said as she took Annabel's hand. "Listen, you must be hungry and cold. Each day come to this address and you'll be fed and clothed, ok?" With that Mei just left walking into the darkness humming softly. Annabel could have sworn that the rain just seemed to part for her, but she was tired that night so she dismissed it as her imagination. That night she actually slept under the umbrella, and oddly, no one took it from her. She was up against a brick wall, the rain pelted her only cover, as if attracted only to it. The wind too, never changing direction. It was like a shield. Others would have taken it from her. Yet, no one did. She didn't understand why but she was thankful.

Since then Mei had just been giving and giving. The address was her house which almost put Buckingham Palace to shame. Meal after meal Annabel was given, three a day, dry clothing, and anything else she needed. Oddly though it was as if Mei knew everything about her, what she needed when she was coming, where she would be. Mei was often dressed in black leather pants and a pink top that left her arms and shoulders bare. Her hair was tied in a ponytail as well.

One day however Mei came to Annabel after school. Despite the two going to different schools Mei even seemed to know EXACTLY when Annabel would leave. "Anna?" Mei asked in her gentle angelic tone. "Would you mind doing me a favor?" It was a rather sunny day and once again Annabel felt like she was looking at an angel, the sun seemed to make Mei look radiant, maybe even with some kind of aura, Annabel rubbed her eyes.

"Sorry." Annabel realized she'd been staring. "I don't know what I could do given my situation however."
Mei shook her head and took Annabel's hand pulling her. It felt like walking with a big sister in a way as Mei took Annabel to a rather dark alleyway.

"I've been having...problems." Mei said with a grin. Annabel wasn't sure why she was grinning.

"You see, it's complicated but my family is...odd, to put it lightly. They're sadistic, and Personally I hate it." Mei took a step forward. "As a friend-" Mei reached into a bag and pulled out a can of soda which Annabel downed quickly loving every second of it. "I need you to come with me, support me in this time of need."

"How would I- I mean I will gladly do so after all you've done Mei I just don't quite get it." Annabel did want to help Mei but she wasn't sure how. Suddenly she doubled over in pain. Mei smiled at this. "Just let it flow through you Annabel." Mei whispered into her ear. "All that pain, all who made fun of you, all the times you were beaten, you feel it...don't you, now, crush them all Mei, let that pain be your strength." Annabel screamed then, the pain was gone, however something had changed. She was taller, much taller, at least 5 meters. (About 16ft) Mei had vanished yet her voice seemed to echo in Annabel's mind. "The more they try to harm you, the more you shall grow. Become the embodiment of pain my dear Annabel, and don't worry we shall meet again." Annabel felt an intense amount of strength rush through her. She slammed her fist into a nearby building shattering it. It hurt her but this only gave her another meter (Almost 20ft now.) Annabel was an amazon, maybe a bit more. Yet she wasn't hurt. She smiled.

"I want to..." She looked herself over. The 13 year old girl hadn't even noticed that her tattered clothing had changed and that wasn't all. She ran to a nearby park her footfalls making soft 'boom' sounds as she did. The park had a large lake which Annabel used as a mirror. She was now even with the street lamps. Looked like she really kept in shape, not muscular but fit for sure. She Her usually messy and unkempt brown hair had become purple, short and straight with bangs that ended midway to her forehead. A pink hoodie, and long brown pants that reached her ankles with cute pink sandals that added 3cm (An inch) to her height. "Wow..." She whispered. For a moment Annabel couldn't help but admire herself. How this happened, why, she had guesses but at the moment she didn't care. She felt...angry, angry at the world and she wanted it to pay for hurting her.

"What would hurt me before makes me grow huh?" She chuckled. "Well then I could always go to Mei's house. Or maybe I should be bigger first, then again...What did Mei want? Did she go home, Maybe I can help her now?"

1132.content:
Lucetta was never the best off in life. From an early age, she was forced to live without a home or family. The only thing that's kept her going these years was her wooden flute she's had as a memento of her parents. Every time she'd play it, something magical would happen. Lucetta would feel more energy surging through her being, her long blonde hair gaining a bit of vibrance and her skin becoming just a tad healthier. It also brought her just enough fortune to buy her food in desperate times. She kept her flute with her everywhere she went, trusting it more than anything else. It was as if it knew exactly what her desires were and became her one and only family member.

It was a regular day out in the streets and Lucetta was about to play her flute in hopes that a passerby might give her something or food might turn up. Feeling hopeful, Lucetta began her tune of light notes and cheerful melodies. At first, nothing happened but a few passers by admiring the sound of her song, maybe a few dollars here and there. She played on in hopes of enough to buy herself a meal, a few more dollars came. When Lucetta came to the end of her song, she looked down at the change. It was usually enough to buy her a piece of bread and water, but today, it wasn't. Lucetta took the change and began to walk off, but in the middle of doing so, she was dazed. When she regained consciousness, Lucetta realized she wasn't on the street anymore. Well, she was, but vastly different. Flute in hand, Lucetta was hundreds of feet tall, towering over the place she called 'home'. She noticed the skyscrapers in the distance and looked down to see tiny houses at her bare, ragged feet. The holes in her clothes and her messy hair had remained, she was just bigger. A whole lot bigger. Taking her first step, Lucetta smashed a house under her sole 'Whoops! Sorry! I didn't mean to!' She cried. Then she realized. She was at the top now. No more poor, homeless Lucetta. She was at the top. She could do whatever she wanted...

So, in light of this, Lucetta decided to...

*knock knock*

*knock knock*

''Ungh...'' a tired Nicole grunts, clambering out of bed at the sound of someone knocking at the door. While she has always disliked the thought of visitors, due to how 'normal' people would usually treat her, she also knows that she needs to answer the door when people knock, because they're usually here for good reason. Nicole doesn't often get visitors who just want to visit her, rather... they usually prefer to treat her like an animal.

However...

''W-who's there?'' Nicole asks, opening her specially modified front door. Standing on her front porch is a man in trade uniform, perhaps in his late thirties.

''Mornin' Miss... Webster?'' the man asks, checking his clipboard. ''I've been called to install a kitchen sink, and I'm here today for a prelim. Are your... parents home?''

''Uh-uhmm, no... I d-don't have any parents.'' The shy Nicole responds warily, ''I-I can show you where the k-kitchen is...?''

''That'd be great, Miss!'' the man responds, unused to having a client so young, and completely new to one as tall as herself, however professional courtesy stops him from asking too many questions. ''Do y... D'you want a coffee or something... s-sir?'' Nicole asks tentatively, as the pair approach the kitchen.

''...OK.'' Nicole stammers, standing on the lino floor, ''well uhh... Kitchen's here. S-sink's there. C-can I get you a-anything?''

''Should be just fine.'' Steve replies, scratching a few things down on his clipboard, ''...actually, hang on a sec. Can I ask a favour, kid?''

Nicole hesitates, having grown used to 'favours', ''...yes?''

''I'm sorry, it's not exactly professional...'' Steve starts, sounding guilty, ''But my ex-wife dumped my kid on me, and I'll be here a while. Wanna help a guy out?

Momentarily stunned, Nicole contemplates before...

“Umm... okay?” Nicole mumbled, and arched into the air. Her ass hovered above Kaitlyn as she tugged the denim down her legs, and kicked it off onto the floor.

“...that good?” She asked.

“Super.” Kaitlyn smiled up at her. “Now for the panties...”

They were much more forgiving, to Kaitlyn’s immense relief. Still a lot of work to tug them all the way down Nicole’s twelve feet of legs, but much easier than jeans. Eventually the panties came off too, and Nicole’s lower half was fully exposed.

“...right!” Kaitlyn rubbed her hands together. She stood between Nicole’s knees, and crept her way amidst the redhead’s thighs.

“Brace yourself,” Kaitlyn winked, and crouched down.

1353.content:
Hannah Stevens is a strange girl by about any standards. This shy, reclusive sixteen year old has jet black hair that sweeps all the way down to her lower back, dark blue eyes, and curves that could make a man - or even a woman - drool. However, in spite of such defining features, you'll never see her pursuing someone.

Because Hannah has an unusual secret; one that would all but stop her from engaging in a normal relationship.

She's not sure what causes it to happen, and even doctors are baffled by her condition - mostly due to it being near impossible to run tests - however she's stuck with it nonetheless.

With no progress towards a cure, no idea of how to even control her problem, and no family to explain how it happened in the first place, it's no wonder young Hannah stays away from most people.

Unable to constantly keep affording new clothes, or live in any normal building, life certainly is tough for the poor girl.

What is this secret that makes Hannah's life so tough, you ask?

Without warning, she can suddenly change size.

She's ranged everywhere from less than a millimetre, to a little short of 100 feet, and she fears that even these limits could be broken. She doesn't even know what her natural height is, although it's estimated at about 5 foot 3, based on scale and proportion. If you couldn't control your size, you'd stay away from society too, wouldn't you?

How does Hannah's story start out?
1353.title: A rare condition.

The year is 1604, you're the heir to the throne of England, a princess, named Valeria. Although that whole heir thing may not last very long, mother is expecting a child, and if it's a boy then he will be the new heir. Despite your age of 6 years old this still angers you, after all you do deserve the throne more than a baby would.

But, never the less that is how it is and how it always was, so no need to fret about it.

There were knocks on the door to your room, as the person came in you saw your gaurdian, Kara, telling of news of a new baby brother. With a look on her face, Kara asked you to follow her. You trusted Kara a lot more than anyone else, so of course you followed assuming you were going to see the baby. But Kara took you to a place in the palace you've never seen before, maybe this is were he was born?

You doubted but followed anyway, you thought no less of it.
"Valeria, you are dissapointed you are no longer heir, no?" Kara asked.
"Of course I am! Its so unfair!"
You complain a small amout more before letting Kara continue
"What if... What if i told you I can help you stay as heir? In fact even more than that."
Baffled you ask "Really! How?"
"Before i say how, you must promise you'll tell no-one, okay?"
"Fine! I won't tell anyone."
As Kara heads toward a drawer, you fiddle with your hair a tad. She arrives with a bottle with some strange purple liquid in it.
"This will make everyone want you back, they may even put you as queen right away!"

You look into the bottle with awe. Will this really make me queen? You ask if this really works and are delighted to hear that it does. You quickly grab the bottle and get close to drinking it, before Kara stops you.

"Valeria, I won't stop you if you decide to drink it all, just remember that the more you drink the stonger it gets." You nod and begin drinking

How much do you drink?

144.content:
In fear of what would come next the five men where brought to an unknown place in this windowless cart. Chained onto each other and stripped naked they could only wait.

After hours the cart finaly came to an halt and the cheering of hundreds was heard outside. The horse snorted and muffled commands where shouted. Finally the doors opened.

The blinding light let the men sightless for mere seconds but as they regained their sight they wished that it had been lost forever. They where brought into some kind of arena with red sand - soaked with blood. A cheering crowd surrounded it and just cheered for their death.

Still not able to see with their complete sight they where led to one side about 20 yards in front of a massive curtaine. Next to the curtain stood a man in oficial dress: "You five are found guilty for the following crime"
144.title: Duchess

1441.content:
"In the night of the 15 to the 16th day of the third month you have tried to poison the royal water supply to murder our beloved duchess. Witnesses have seen you and the evidence, a heavy poison, that would not have killed her by the way, have been found in your posession. Furthermore you are not a citizen of our proud state. The duchess herself will judge your crime and fulfill the sentence."

The people cheered again at his words. For the first time in their life the five men, members of a rival tribe of the east of the kingdom will see the mysterious, mighty ruler of the behated country. Nothing could have prepared them for what was about to happen to them. Nearly completed their adjustment of the sudden light they saw the colorful curtain and expected it to move but not this kind of movement. As it lifted they prepared to see the royal cabin of the duchess but instead it revealed a mighty foot attached to a leg that went up in the shadow of the dress. the other foot appeared at the edge of the fabrik of the royal dress and dipped up and down. Her feet where clad in shoes of blackened leather. It seems that more than a dozen cows had to give their skin just for one shoe. The rather thick sole have been made of wood by the most skilled carpenters in the kingdom just as the manhigh heel. Silver and diamonds raised the value of this footwork into regions the barbaric convicts in front of it could not even measure. They just stared in awe at it because they knew that even one of them would wage the worth of a whole village of theirs.

A mischievous laugh released them from their awe and made them look further up the fabrik as they now knew that the dutchess was right in front of them. She was sitting and looking at them with a glitter in her eyes that none of them could interpret. "trying to kill me you worthless fleas? You are nothing but a bunch of barbarics and lowlifes. I am fed up with you. I was thinking for some time to take over your puny country so my people have more place to live and, congratulations, you have made my decision. Of course you will all die. It is up to you if you die fast or slowly. Now bow down with your forehead on the ground."
1441.title: Treachery

14412.content:
"Proud people we from the western reamls are", one of them sayed. A big sturdy man with a black mustard. The hair on his head was shaved in the traditional form of the tribes, like all the other man. "We are..."

The dutchess bend down with an evil glare in her big green eyes and snatched the man on the chest with her forefinger and thumb. With no visible effort she lifted up the whole collonne of men tied together. The men screamed in agony as each of their shoulders and legs where sharing the weight of the men next to him. A smack in a shoulder of the arm of the last man in the lane made him scream out in pain as it left its socket.

The duchess tightened her grip on his body until he made a grimasse of pain. "How proud are you little pest?", she asked and started to squeeze tighter. "You seemed to have voted for the slow death but you will beg me for mercy soon enough. Just pray that I am still in the mood then to grant it" She sayed after shaking the man and the whole collumn, dislocating every limb attached to a chain. She squeezed until he was not able to breath anymore and his body was on the limit of its durability. "Do you can imagine how many bones I can break? How easily I could rip you appart?" With that her other hand grabbed the ankle of the man in her grasp and with a lazy motion she turned the whole leg around, braking his knee and hipbone as much as tearing appart dozens of muscles. The man could barely breath and only hissed from pain but this was just the beginning as she bend the lower leg upwards until it broke at the knee. She didn't stop there until his toes touched his twisted hip. The man screamed and the men on his side to as the tension of the chains where increased and his dislocated leg hurt like hell too. "I want you to beg me to have mercy with you"
14412.title: All disobey

144122.content: "Never", he just hissed under his breath. The duchess eyes narrowed. "We will see about that", she snarled. She flicked at his still mostly intact leg, shattering it in the result and letting the man scream in pain again with some of his remaining breath. "Maybe I should tear you into tiny little pieces. Slowly. Part by part. Limb by limb." One of the other man groaned in pain. "Shut up while i am talking", yelled at him. With aggressive motion she grabbed the man and pulled him from the collone, leaving his leg and arm dangle at the chain while his heart poured hot blood over her hands. She was carefull not to spoil her dress as her hands wrapped around him. She felt the bones crack and his screams became gurgling as she squeezed the life out of him within not even a second before dropping him to the ground at her feet. "He was lucky", she whispered. "I will give you one more chance." She dropped the remaining men too.
144122.title: He stayes proud

1441221.content:
"I will now give you the chance to at least save your families." She sayed in a generous voice while looking at her heavily injured captives like vermin she thought about probably sparing. "Tell me which of your barbaric settlements you call home and I will assure you that your wife and children will be my personal property and therefore spare your fate. She waited some seconds and watched the remaining men with growing impatience as they groaned at her feet. Unable to move throug their broken bones and mostly unable to speak with their punktured lungs and blood in their mouth.

Carefuly she lifted one of her mighty feet and placed it on the back of the one man sharing his chain with a disemebered arm and leg. Slowly she increased the pressure on him and listened to the only sound he was able to make. A mind curling scream of agony and pain as his body was slowly compressed between the wooden sole of her shoe and the gravel of the ground. His bones shifted before they shattered and punctured multiple organs as he became more flat by every passing second. She took her time and saviored the horrified looks of the men next to him as she knew what kind of sight this must be to him. Snap after Snap, Crack after crack her foot made her way to the ground. He died before her sole touched the sand but even then he was still screaming. With one sudden, loud crack it was over and his skull burst just shortly after his ribcage. An explosion of blood erupted from beneath her and colored his neighbor crimson red with warm gore. The dutchess kept a smile on her face the whole time, even as she noticed that some of her folks turned away from the gruesome display of power.

"You still have a chance to talk. His family will shortly join him as a stain beneath my royal foot, you maggots. I will take these shoes with me for your relatives to clean as I trample your houses and your belongings after my soldiers are finished looting your pathetic villages. No one tries to betray me!"

"What about you?", She twisted shortly on the corpse while pressing her foot down with great strength and lifted it shortly after to reveal a pulpy mess of blood and mangled, splintered bones. She again waited a few seconds as her sole hovered above her next victim. Blood dropping on his already soaked body. "Are you wiser? will you talk or do I have to exterminate ALL of you to get peace for my people? Believe me that the King won't mind getting rid of you." Slowly her shoe lowered again.

15122.content:
Ever wonder how it would be like living all your life as a giant monster girl? Well, sadly this is what Chihiro or as many call her, Chihirozilla had to do. Chihiro is 10 years old, and has brown hair and rosy cheeks. She has a childlish appearance, and a quite pudgy face. She also has tan skin like Chihiro from the movie Spirited Away, and she has brown eyes as well. Sadly, for her circumstances, she always wears a orange bikini (two-piece), which always exposes most of her body. She also has D-Cup breast surpisngly, and for the reason you are about to see explains all of this.

You see, her father was a researcher in kaiju DNA, and it was originally meant to be used as weapons for war, where they can make giant monsters controlled by the government. He had a wife, who gave birth to the girl Chihiro, however she was diagonised with a rare disease that would have killed Chihiro as a baby. The father had to take drastic measures in order to save his newborn daughter, so he injected kaiju DNA inside of her. Surprisingly to them, Chihiro survived, however though, she changes in a colossal way.

First of all. Chihiro grew to extraordinary heights just as she got older, to eventually standing at a massive 180ft tall, the size of an average showa monster from the Godzilla series. However, that's not all it did to her. She also had instant body regernation, so her wounds restore instantly if she suffers. Her vocal cords were enhanced, letting her roar like an actual giant monster. She can also breathe underwater, has high invulernability to many weapons, and can even shoot laser beams out of her eyes from her eyes. Explaining her breast expansion, well the DNA did do some strange things to her,

Regarding her life though, well, it was another story, The government over the years made her clothes that would fit with her, but often times Chihiro is seen wearing an orange bikini. She currently lives in the fictional Diamond City (a mixture of Tokyo, and New York City, with soem Miami in it.) She lived their her whole life. She lives on a private island nearby, with has everything she needs to live there. She is also a great person in Diamond City. She plays with the kids alot, she helps out the city like with demoltion works, and she does plenty of other things. She is a blessing to have there. Chihiro is homeschooled, but still, she is a nice and caring girl. She would also use her powers to defend the city when a threat comes along. There is more to her character... but one thing for sure... She is a kaiju.

Note: The people like her so much, that they name her Chihirozilla, and she likes that name.

http://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/1050792?... (an example on how I based the character Chihiro's appearances from)

Want to use her?

15122111.content:
It is the year 1932 and the Great Depression is in full swing many businesses are closing down and thousands of people are out of work now you may think this is America but it's really not its fictional Diamond City which is sort of similiar to the U.S. but also resembles Tokyo as well on top of all the unemployment and high crime sprees which is becoming out of control,seriously all the cops and local detectives are being swamped there are rumors of some sort of monstrous creature roaming the countrysides and scaring the living daylights out of farmers and their livestock but no one is paying any mind they have too much to be concerned with rather than make believe giant monsters until now that is.

Chihirozilla is busy slowly walking along the pathway of the backwoods of Diamond City normally she is as quiet as a mouse barely causing any damage other than stepping on a few trees or accidentally a moose or a bear(she couldn't help it then again neither could you if you were over 100 feet tall)but today she was kind of in a hurry as this weekend it was the annual Fourth of July for Diamond City but due to the poor economy downfall City Hall couldn't even manage to buy any fireworks though a huge crowd was going to be gathering for the eventful day so Chihirozilla or Chi for short decided maybe she could help out but that was easier said than done as up until now nobody in the city or elsewhere ever saw her in full only quick glimpses of her foot or something passing through she was said to be something of a urban legend sort of like Big Foot or the Loch Ness Monster.

As the city was getting ready for its annual Fourth of July the townspeople were in a uproar about the tremors and rumors of a monster nearby but for the umpteenth time the mayor shook it off

"For the last time people we have a lot more to worry about than this 'giant monster' nonsense!" He said through the microphone

"Bu.....but Mr. Mayor there have been dozens of eyewitnesses who swore they saw massive footprints that seemed to spring up out of nowhere and the tremors large violent earth shaking ones! You have had to heard them everything in our houses is toppling over........."

"Once again absolute nonsense have any of you seen this supposed monster?" He bellowed

"Well no not really...." Said one eyewitness

"Then there's really nothing to worry about.........Oh My Goodness what-what's that?" He screamed dropping his mike as the others on the platform scattered in fear as the new set of tremors started up and people turned and screamed sone even tried running for their lives as the huge shadow appeared over the horizon.

For the giant young ten year old with the pink swimsuit looking completely bizarre even for that time period and utterly terrifying height this was both the craziest and yet most fasincating thing she had ever done

"Gee I'm so nervous!" She thought all giddy and nerves shot "I never shown myself in front of a group of people before......not since the accident I wonder what they'll think of me will they be afraid or accept me for who I really am......" But the words had barely got out of her mouth when she heard multiple screams coming from below and looked down

"Ahhhhhhhhhhh Runnnnnnnnnnn! It....it's a monster!" The people screamed and ran for it at once Chi panicked

"No wait please I mean no harm...Oops......" She cried as she tried carefully running after them she tripped over one of those really old fashioned parked cars and fell over luckily nobody was seriously injured as she got back up trying to explain her actions "No really don't run I mean you no harm! My name's Chihirozilla but you can call me Chi for short....hey please stop running!" She pleaded as she tried reaching down and picking up a few of the fleeing crowd but they slipped through her big enough fingers "Oh shoot they're far too afraid of me now what do I do?" She grumbled miserably to herself.............
15122111.title: Pre-WW2 (1922-1939)

Chihirozilla was desperately trying to calm everyone down the old fashioned way by yelling but nothing was working so she tried using her mighty abilities first she inhaled deeply but this only caused people to fly uncontrollably to separate parts of the city luckily she managed to catch them in time before they went splat!

"There you go little ones! Sorry about that!" She whispered but still they were utterly terrified of her as they kept on running and she was starting to get a tad frustrated

"Okay people please STOP!!" She screamed once again her hurricane like powers sent several people flying into the air but this time a few tiny children were awestruck rather than frightened

"Wow!" They cried out "Do that again!!" Chi stopped confused as so did the crowd

"What? Huh? They.....they like it? They like me using my powers?? Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm......." She thought thinking hard maybe she couldn't befriend the crowd the normal way but if she could use her abilities maybe she could......

"That's it!!" She cried several citizens looked up at the young giantess bewildered "Sorry but it seems you like it when I use my powers!"

"Bu...but you're a monster how can you look that way? All human and....." One citizen called up

151231.content:
Kari's POV(First Person):

The date is Friday, June 5th, 2020, 12:00 p.m. My current location is Newport Beach, CA, Earth. As I walk across the sand I see the water rising up due to the Moon's gravity, then coming back down to meet the ocean. As I walk further the tides grow larger, I'm guessing because the Moon's gravity is stronger there. Anyway, I'm thinking I should introduce myself. My name is Kari Sirius Aquila, I know, it's a funny name. Unlike to dominant species of this planet, I am not fully human. 1/4 of my DNA belongs to humans, while the rest belongs to the PODs who live 320,000,000,000 miles away from here, at the Iridius galaxy, which is made of the Red Hypergiant. Perhaps I should go deeper into my history, I know you're confused. I was born at the planet Acex, in the Iridius galaxy with my 32,000 brothers and sisters. As a POD, my job was to venture off to a planet, and unify it with Acex. It might sound a bit parasitic, but it's just how we live. I was sent here to do that exact thing, and I've been living in secrecy, all the while blending into this planet's strange culture. I even got a job, writing I had gotten good at many thing. Basketball, Volleyball, Saxophone, Cheer, and a special thing they called video game, which was where most of my talent enlisted. I was born with special abilities that were put into a pill, I would need them when trying to unify Earth because of our history of failing at unifying planets, although it hardly happens. But today I was especially happy, because today I was only 12 years into my eternal life, but tomorrow, I would be...13! Old enough to finally receive that special pill to unify this planet with Acex, and I was even more excited because then Earth would get to see our home and our culture. But in that special pill, were some very strange powers, and that was why I had waited for this very moment, which was tomorrow! I happily walked over to my gyrosphere, which was a rounder, better, and less expensive version of what you humans would call a...car. I drove over to my apartment in Irvine, which was a beautiful city. I got out and walked in, I opened the door to my apartment and seeing that there were so many things I had to do to prepare for this special outcome, I quickly rushed while drinking an energy drink.

Step #1: I had to take a bath. I'm not going to tell you how that went.

Step #2: I had to research Earth's form of defenses. I found very interesting things and devised a strategy using my ability knowledge and these sites I was looking at. When I was finished, if things went too dirty. It might not look so well for Earth.

Step #3: Adjust my presentation to the planet: I used my variety of dresses and beauty abilities that were not taken from me to develop a presentation. I thought about once I had reached the form I would use, I should use my ability to shine in front of others. Or I could to that, and light fire works for a better display. Oh, well. I'd figure it out.

Step #4: Explain their current situation: I'd have to explain the situation to them without alarming them. This was the hard part. In our history every planet unified has had it's species running away. With the unifier trying to calm everybody down. I've talked to my baby brothers and soothed them so many times whenever I visited my home planet, but this was 7.3 billion older people. But I assured myself I had an ability that could help me...I might.

Step #5: Get ready to use force: I quickly got myself ready for any bad situation. Ready to use my abilities to thwart any of their attempts to stop me. Although I almost broke a window. But didn't, so I'm okay.

Step #6: Get myself to have a little fun: I could do that by myself. I'm really good at having fun.

Step #7: Get ready for any other galactic visitors: Who knows who other invaders could be coming, so it's my job to get ready for any other invaders just in case they try to do anything stupid. And in the meantime have fun, and get the humans on my side.

Step #8: Keep myself energized: I have to learn how to use any abilities I have to keep myself energized. Such as using the sun's energy, which could power this planet for a year.

Step #9: Rest: You know what that means.

After getting myself ready for the big day. I check the clock: It's 5:39 p.m. I take my shoes off and get in my bed to sleep. I exhausted myself so much, not even the energy drink could stop me from passing out. I sleep for 2 hours until I see a bright green light. I think I'm dreaming, but I realise I'm not! It's my brother Kai, coming to send a message.He's wearing a light suit, and he's shrunken himself to the size of a chess piece. "Hey, sis!" He says. "I'm just coming to remind you that tomorrow's the day when you're supposed to unify this...weird planet. I even shrunk myself so I wouldn't get noticed." "Yeah, like that would help." I say, giggling. "And, why are you sleeping? You should be getting ready." He replies. "I have. And you chose the right time to come." I reply. "Really?" He asks. "No." I reply. "Something in your room stinks. Should I look for it?" He asks. "No, It's just my feet in my socks, which have been running around all day." I reply. "Well, do you want me to fix them?" He asks getting my attention for a second.
151231.title: Today Is The Day...or at least tomorrow.

1512311.content:
Kari's POV(First Person):

After Kai asks me that question, I realize that there's one step I forgot to take, ground troops! Who knows what weapons these guys have with them? If I'm just focusing on the air? Who know what could happen to me on the ground? Surely I could have some help with that, considering my feet do stink, bad impression. And even if there weren't any ground troops (which there probably will be), I'd just be teasing and having fun with my tiny bro. "Okay sure, go for it." I say, looking at him and smiling. "Um...okay." He says, nervous, he caught on quickly. He walks to the top of my covers and goes through. He comes back up and says, "Are you playing a trick on me?" He asks. "Maybe, or maybe not." I reply. "Okay, whatever trick you have planned for me, I'm ready for it." He says, ducking back down. "I hope he means that." I whisper to myself.

Kai's POV(First Person):

I duck back down through my sister's covers and crawl down, looking for her feet. I know she's going to play a trick on me, but I'm ready for it. Most Likely she's going to take the sock off with me in it and trap me there, or something else. But have a few strategies and I can hope for the best. I crawl over and hit a soft surface. Maybe a blanket. I try and throw it across, but it won't budge. "Hey, Stop!" Kari says. I turn a light on my suit on and see her foot, but it's encased in a giant cloth. "Um, sis, you foot's covered in something." I say. "What? It's a sock. You've seen me wearing them." She replies. "No I haven't" I reply. I make my was up to this thing's mouth, and crawl through it. "Okay, where this thing making your feet stink?" I ask. "At the sole." She replies. "Okay." I say as I crawl to the sole. Suddenly I feel her foot moving, then I feel my body push into the ground and further into her foot, which does smell. She's trying to crush me. "How does that feel?" She asks. "Moist, soft, and a bit painful." I reply. "Okay." She says, taking her sock off. I knew it. She turns it over and I fall into the deep pit of her shoe. Dang It! I didn't know it. She then puts her foot through it, and begins to crush me again, only a lot more painful. "OKAY STOP STOP STOP STOP STOP!" I yell. "Okay, fine." She says giggling as she takes her foot off of me. "How did that feel?" She asks holding me in her hand. "Very painful." I reply. "Good! And a bit bad. Sorry. But now I'm actually ready!" She says. "Anyway, I've got to get some sleep. Bye..." She says as she falls asleep. "Okay, bye, bye, bye." I says trying to get free from her grasp. I can't so I just stay with her. Her sleeping face is as beautiful as always.
1512311.title: One Last Training Step

15123111.content:
Kari's POV(First Person):

After having some fun with my brother Kai, I went back to sleep to wait for my special pill, containing the many powers I would use to complete my job with Earth, and prepare for the next one. While I'm asleep, I notice I'm holding onto something. It feels like rubber, and skin. Oh well, It's probably one of those things I feel in a dream, and I drift back off to sleep. I have a dream though. I'm right where I am, but when I look out side, it's...my home planet! It looks as beautiful as it did the last time I visited it. The color-changing sky, the trees and plants everywhere, even in midair and upside down, the buildings, floating, and in all directions, and what surprised me even more, was that Earth and it's inhabitants were there! I had finished the job! I was so happy I rushed out of my apartment room, then the main door, then...stepped on a few hundred. I was big or they were small. Even still, our atmosphere regenerates anything that was deconstructed. I was so happy I danced around, stepping on more, they reconstructed a few miles over from me. I jumped, then fell on my apartment floor. I had been sleepwalking. "Are you a lunambulist?" Kai asks, pointing at the door, which the moonlight was shining through. "Oh, no. Just thinking about the day ahead that's all." I reply. I look at the clock, which was ringing. 12:00a.m. "WOOHOO!" I exclaim. "Well, happy b-day Kari!" Kai says, realizing I rushed out the door. He follows me. I run outside, Kai looks on a GPS and says. "Over there!" He points to a large green comet flying towards, Japan. Kai takes my hand, presses a button, and his suit transforms into a rocket, with me in it! "Hold on!" My brother says as we ride over to she location of the comet. We land in Kyoto, not Tokyo. We walk over to the comet, which is actually a case. I press on it, it reads my fingerprint, and opens. I see a pill, a note, a tube like generator, and a bunch of syringes. I read the note, it says, "Sorry, we mistook Kyoto for Tokyo. Meh, from what we've seen it will be less ordinary. Anyway, take the syringes in the order below, use the generator, then take the pill."

Thanx, Anonymous People. :D

The note says:

Red: Clothes
Yellow: Belly
Green: Both Feet(and don't smell them after)
Blue: Near Eyes
Generator: Belly

"Boy, those elders sure are good at making notes." Kai says. I use the syringes, then the generator, and finally, the moment of truth, when I was finally able to take the pill. "Oh jeez." Kai says, backing away. "Let's go into that cave before you do." Kai says. "Okay." I say, I run into the cave. And take the pill, then a really good feeling blindsides me. A red glow radiates around me, as yellow orange energy generates around me, then, I begin to grow. My clothes stretch out to fit me (thanks red syringe)it would be real embarrassing if I didn't use it, I walk outside the cave, growing steadily, and towering above the other buildings, I dive into the ocean to avoid being seen. It creates a mini-tsunami, that (thankfully) doesn't hit land. "Okay, I'm going back now..." Kai says as he transforms into a rocket again and goes back home. "SEE YOU SOON! BUT NOT THAT SOON!" He yells. He can only imagine what's going to happen at noontime.
15123111.title: And The Clock Strikes Twelve!

choices: Let them fall on me and see what happens
151231111.content:
Japan and the world's POV(Third Person):

The time is 1:00 p.m., Friday, June 6th, 2020. The citizens of Kyoto, Japan are happily moving around, minding their own business, as of the rest of the world. In fact, any of their departments of security are slow, as is news. Little do they know that their days were all about to get a lot stranger, wackier, zanier, and much more hectic. Meanwhile, at Kotobikihama Beach (Harp-Playing Beach in English) more resident of Kyoto were happily minding their own business, wandering around, surfing, doing other water things, when all of a sudden, when things didn't look like they could get any better, or worse, somebody sees gigantic bubbles coming out of the water and popping. "何？ それらは何ですか？！" He asks. "私は知らないよ。多分ちょうど鯨や大きな魚。" Another one replies. Then, the unexpected happens. Water shoots out of the oean up to 52,800 feet high. The Japanese can do nothing but stare in awe. People dared to take their gadgets out and take pictures, but when the water leaves, they see a girl, except she's 52,800 yards tall, and they had no idea she could grow larger, her clothes fit her, which is surprising, they would have just snapped apart at 15 feet, and she's shining. Suddenly, every single eye on the world that's looking at a TV or streaming sevice was tuned to Japan, on this mysterious girl. "HELLO!" She booms at what seems to her is anormal voice, but it produces a shockwave, pushing everything away a bit, and breaking every single piece of glass. She then takes a deep breath, and says. "THIS MIGHT BE A BIT OF A SUPRISE TO EVERYBODY DOWN THERE! BUT, I ASSURE YOU I CAN EXPLAIN THE SITUATION!" She says giggling. "Every person of pilotics around the world are either sitting at a table, or on an e-conference. Then, President Putin says. "Okay, America, what have you done now?" "Nothing." President Maroon Obama says. "Was It Merkel?" "Okay let's stop playing the blame game. Right now there is a girl, 52,800 yards high, we don't know what she can do, and she's at a beach in my country." Japanese Prime Minister, Shinzō Abe says. "Okay, but we need a military strategy." Putin says. "How surprising. You're the first guy to say that." President Obama says.

Kari's POV(First Person):

I rize from my slumber, energized and ready to do some unifying. I look down, my clothes are looking a lot more red, yellow orangre, electrical, one pieced and shiny.
"HELLO!" I say. "THIS MIGHT BE A BIT OF A SUPRISE TO EVERYBODY DOWN THERE! BUT, I ASSURE YOU I CAN EXPLAIN THE SITUATION!" I say giggling.
"ALRIGHT! SO, WHAT GOING ON IS THAT I'M NOT REALLY FROM THIS PLANET. AND WHAT I'M SUPPOSED TO DO IS NOT DESTROY, BUT UNIFY THIS PLANET WITH MINE!" I say.

World Leaders POV(Third Person):
"Wait, did she just say..." President Obama says. "Okay, deploying all military forces." Putin says.

Back to Kari(First Person):
"ALRIGHT, NOW LET ME JUST...OH." I say. The Japanese people look down and she another tsunami, heading straight for them.
"ああ神！" One says as the others run away, it's no use, they get washed up by the gigantic wave, and are pulled in toward me. I try to save them by picking them up from the ocean, I kneel down and...yes! I've got them! I slowly put them back, and proceed to...fight the militaries. Oh Boy. I look up, bomber planes, and down ground troops, that'll be easy. I duck and catch a bomb from one of the planes, and drop it down on the soldiers, part of them are obliterated. I do that another time, but they keep coming. I lift my foot, encased in a small heel. The soldiers shoot at it. But I can still bring it down with ease on them. I quickly lift it up, they're still alive, but paralyzed. Yes! There's more shooting, but once their bullets hit my skin, I easily absorb them, and for some reason it makes me a bit more powerful, I slowly grab the soldiers and drop them into my endless pockets fueled by black holes. A bunch of tanks come forward, I take the top off of one, but that seems less fun to me. I mean I have to have fun or I'll get bored. I raise my foot, and put it down on the tanks. The people are still paralyzed, not dead. I walk forward to deal with the bombers, there's one particularly fast one, but I'll deal with it later, then big bombs repeadetly drop on me and I decide to...
151231111.title: A Normal Day...until noon.

1512311111.content:
Kari's POV(First Person):

I decide to catch them in my had, thinking this suit could only last so much. Once they fall, I catch them in my hands, I can feel them explode in my hands, but its more of a vibrating sense. I open them and see rather than scrap metal, a giant, blue, static ball. And a blue spot signals on my suit, in the center, I put it in the slot, and I feel an energizing sense in me. A then feel like in about to burp as the fast and powerful bomber cones toward me, perfect. I let it out, and rather than a burp, it's a burst of yellow energy, it hits the bomber, releasing all of it's bombs, which look like super-charged pills, I grab them and shove them in my mouth. I then feel another energizing feeling. I begin to run, stepping over panicking people along the way, and grabbing ones on building, stuffing them in my pocket, energizing me, stepping on ground troops and tanks, energizing me, and that's when I feel it. I make my foot glow a yellow orange, twist it upward so the bottom toe part faces me a little, then stomp on the ground, causing an extremely powerful shockwave on the ground, creating an earthquake, and another tsunami. Yes! Perfect chance! I head over to the tallest building I can find as it probably hold it's leader...I assume. I walk over to it, look through the window, wave the people inside hello, then I give the building a big...hug. I accidentally shake the building a little though. I look back through, the people looked a bit spooked. "Sorry." I say. I realize if I'm going to get any luck with this, I shouldn't just be staying in Japan and beating them into submission, should go look for the world's leaders and try to find them. "Hm." I think to myself. "Where would those little guys by hiding?" I use a GPS embedded in my mind by the suit to look for every possible place they'd be. I find to really good places, but I can't decide. After a few seconds of walking around and accidentally stepping on stuff (sorry) I decide upon...
1512311111.title: Catch them in my hand

15123111111.content:
Kari's POV(First Person):

I decide upon Area 51 in the U.S. where my job started. I figure it's a smart choice since I announced I'm an Alien, and that's where they take care of all their alien stuff. I look down at Japan, some buildings are in ruins, some still standing, water everywhere, people running, others on the ground, paralyzed. I decide to take one last big step. I raise my foot, then I saw a little man, staring at my boot. I move my foot over to him and nudge his head a little with my toe, encased in the shoe, then I put my foot down, paralyzing millions, destroying some cars and buildings (sorry), and creating another shock wave. "WELL, THANKS FOR NOT FREAKING OUT TOO MUCH, BUT I'VE GOT TO GO FIND SOMEONE. BYE! I'LL SEE YOU ONCE MY WORK IS DONE!" I say in a regular voice (from my perspective). I make an Anti-Gravity signal from my head, and suddenly begin to float off the ground, as everyone else does, Then rockets in my boot accelerate syncing with my Anti-Gravity, and I fly off to the U.S. everybody else falls onto the ground. As I fly above the clouds, I can see outer space, Its stars, sun and...a few missles flying toward me. They launched some missles at me! I try and dodge them, but they're tracking me, I keep dodging them until I eventually give up and let them hit me. Nothing bad happens, and I become more energized again. I look below the clouds and see a city with a familiar looking tall one. The Empire State Building, Bingo, New York City! I slowly landed on the beach, my feet landing in the water. They hardly take up any space. "You know, I could do with a lot larger than this." I say. I begin to grow larger. Once I'm done, I'm 128,000 feet tall, my foot size is a 5,280. Some more bombers, I ignore them and let them drop bombs on me. I grow more powerful with every one. I tiptoe onto the city, trying not to destroy any buildings. I step on some people, but they're still only paralyzed. I have a little fun with all the ground troops trying to stop me. Now they're using bioweapons. I playfully lift my foot and rip the top off of a tank, then step on dozens of others, and hundereds of other soldiers. It seems really fun to me, but maybe not for the soldiers. I look up any news feeds on the computer in my suit on Area 51, and see this guy named Putin giving a speech.

World Leader's POV(Third Person): "In order to stop these large scale invasions from destroying Earth, we have to go deeper, we must kill the weed at it's root. Destroy the invader's home planet, any the planets of any other invaders!" Putin says. "Mister Putin, I'm sure this girl has a logical reason..." Obama says. "No, the Japanese Prime Minister says. "She attacked a city and threatened to enslave us all! We must stop her!" He says. "Okay," Putin says. "Are you ready?" He asks. "Yes, let's press it." The Japanses Prime Minister says. All of them press a button saying, "EXTREME MILITARY FORCE." Upon being pressed the button switches off all lights, and blocks Kari's feed. Little did they know that they had just sealed part of humanity's fate.

Kari's POV(First Person): Earth wants to destroy me and my home planet. Impossible. How can they kill me right now? Clearly none of their attacks are working. And how are they supposed to get to the Iridius galaxy, they'd all die at the Andromeda Galaxy! Oh well, I guess it's time to give humanity a piece of my mind. If anybody read my strategy, let's just say I warned them. My emotions become a mix of Joy, and Anger. My hair begin to light fire a bit. "SO, YOU GUYS DOWN HERE ARE THINKING ABOUT DESTROYING ME AND MY HOME PLANET? WELL, YOU CLEARLY SEE HOW YOUR LITTLE PLAN IS WORKING NOW." I say, smiling and maintaining my cool. I look at all the planes circling around me like flies and grab them. I shove them into the bottomless pocket in my suit, they all fall into a large vortex of who know what. I look around to check and see there's no more planes, which, there are, but the ground surprises me the most. It's overflowing with tanks and soldiers. "HEE HEE HEE, HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA!" I begin to laugh at the sight, I raise my foot in my boot and press a button, rockets engage as I wave them bye bye, The boot rockets off my large foot, and crashes into the ground, as vaccums in my boot suck up the paralyzed survivors, ready to be crushed when I put it back on. More troops came. "YOU ALL JUST KEEP COMING AND COMING AND COMING. OH WELL MORE OR ME." I taunt as I step onto land and put my foot down as a huge barrier, the troops were forced to do nothing but fire at a gigantic foor encased in a bright red sock. I then lower my sole down, trapping the retreating soldiers below my gigantic foot. I move it around to gride them into it. They pass through the fabric, and into my big bare foot, I use an ability I have, absorbtion, the soldiers end up being encsed by my man skin cells, and pulled into my foot. Speaking f which, with the sun beaming on me, me absorbing it's energy into my body, powering up and energizing it, I realize I've got all the time in the Multi-Verse and decide to have some fun...
15123111111.title: The Alien Air Base!...And a stop along the way.

choices: Use A Human As A Foot Toy.
Create Another Planet To Stomp Out?
151231111111.content:
Kari's POV(First Person):

I decide upon exploring the deeper powers which were embedded in the pill when I was born. I walk across the street, ignoring the bombs being dropped on me that were doing nothing but powering me up and energizing me, obliviously using my ability to create a huge shockwave when I stepped, as I walked I trapped thousands of soldiers in my foot, only for them to be pulled in by the trillions of skin cells on it. "THIS IS GOING TO BE AS EFFORTLESS AS ANYTHING ELSE I'VE DONE ON THIS PLANET." I say to the microns below. I feel the bombs I swallowed earlier in my belly, and I decide to mix that with some of the energy I'm using. Genius. As soon as I do that, blue energy begins to generate around my bell button, and a huge wormhole appears in place of it. I giggle as I suck in tens of thousands of troops, bombers, and other things with it, in the process only making me more energized and stronger. I use my Anti-Gravity ability to lift everything that's not attached to the ground off of it, leaving only me to grab the tiny specks, and absorb them into my body. As I raise my foot over another group of soldiers they begin to smell the odor, but then, they pass out. I realize, the syringe made my foot odor poison gas. "OKAY, THAT'S A LITTLE WIERD FOR A POWER, BUT I'LL MOVE ON. I'VE GOT A LOT MORE THINGS TO DO." I say. I lift my right foot up, and my shoe comes back to the suit, I do the same with my left foot. I get ready to grow even bigger, and I do. I become 250,000 feet tall, my shoe size becoming a terrifying 128,000 yards tall! I'm about to playfully step on a city when I realize...there are people down there. I use my Anti-Gravity to pick them all up, then I step down and absorb all of the soldiers, I lower the, back down, minimum damage thankfully. I repeat this a few times until I finally make it to Area 51 in Nevada. And the world's army is ready for me when I arrive. I see black, would-be gigantic tanks, high class drones and bombers circling around me, and tens of millions of ground troops. I then decide to "burp" I hold my mouth, then when the aircrafts get close I unleash a gigantic streak on electricity on them, bringing every single one in my path down. The tanks begin firing at me, but I'm able to use a big force field, reflecting their shots at them and still energizing me. Then, I take my turn and stomp on the ground, creating a shockwave and destroying all their weapons. Then, a garage opens, I see 6 people in big suits come out. They've been grown too, but not even close to where I'm at. They begin firing at me with a series of weapons, one making me a bit tired , I let out a yawn, but tears come out of my eyes when I yawn, and instead of a few tears, a big waterfall comes our of my eyes, washing the troops down, once I look down, I realize, all of my foes have been defeated, I see flags from all countries, that means...I've won. There's nothing stopping me from unifying this tiny planet now! "WOOHOO!" I exclaim in triumph, as I begin to dance. I begin to realize that they don't really deserve to die, so I revive them, but with no weapons (DUH). I decide I should go ahead and celebrate. But how? One thing I enjoyed was using foot toys, but where would I get one of those at this size? Or maybe I should use a human. I don't know, but it was beginning to be confusing...could humans, if under the right circumstances, be foot toys? A little science experiment for me...
151231111111.title: The Most Powerful Force On Earth...DEFEATED!

1512311111111.content:
Kari's POV?(First Person):

I decided upon taking a tiny human and using them as a foot toy. I think of it as a little trophy to celebrate my victory over the humans, and I'll be able to have a little fun, with someone other than my brothers and sisters for instance. And If they prove to be fun, maybe I'll be able to create some on my home planet, and share them with my relatives. I look down and walk around, looking for a human, that I'd be able to put my foot on without killing at this size. No luck, /I'm about to decide upon shrinking down a little, when I see one of the elite soldiers made bigger to fight me on their own. I smile and wave a friendly wave. "Hey there, mind taking a trip with me for a bit?" I ask. "Oh dear god NO!" I can hear him say as he tries to run away. I'm effortlessly able to walk to him and pick his tiny self up. He's a dark brown skinned man, with a cute face, and a very tall body. "Oh come on, it won't be so bad. And you look cute by the way." I say, trying to comfort him. "I'm just performing a little experiment that's all...and being a little mischievous." I say, pressing the button realizing my shoe from my foot. I put it down and slowly lower him into the boot. I press a button causing the sole to heat up. "The sole is made of memory foam, you'll be comfy in there, I promise." I tell him, I'm not sure if it'll be comfy to him or not, I don't know how human nerves work. I put my foot in and begin walking over to the spot where I'd need to use the tool unifying this planet with mine. I can instantly feel him squirming and moving. He feels good to me and is instantly fun already! I guess my experiment worked. I walk over until a light beeps on my chest, I reached the spot. I feel the human getting up above my toes. I have a little more fun and wiggle my toes around, playfully hitting and rubbing him with them. I decide I should let him out, I've done enough. I take him out of my shoe and put him back down on the ground. I should have. I've got some more work to do...
1512311111111.title: A Little Trophy To Keep...and an experiment

153.content: The next question is what is she up to?
153.title: Alien Girl

choices: Somewhere in a city in a country of earth
1532.content:
"Infestation localized" The red light on her HUD flashed brightly as she entered the solar system. "I have found another hive of them", she called to the HQ. "Awaiting further orders" "How bad is it?" "It is going into the billions. As far as I can see there are no solar defenses but a large aray of lifeforms on the planet" "GT - S - 5722, do a full scan of the planet and report back as soon as you have done so." "Roger mum, aproaching. Estimated arival within full scan range in about a week. Hear you then" "Good luck"

Unnoticed by earth the black vessel of unknown origin made its way through our solar system to our beloved planet earth.
1532.title: devastating

15321.content:
"As usual, the subjects are hiding but mostly in high population. Wait, they seemed to have forged an alliance with another lifeform. Quite primitive if you ask me but definatly intelligent and humanoid. Do we have any information about the humanoids on this planet?" "Wait 5722, I will browse intel - no. They are not developed far enough and are too small to establish any relations to them. Proceed with your primary target. If you have the chance, capture and gather more information about this people." "Most of the targets are hiding in the cities of the humanoids." "Proceed with your primary mission at any cost." "Roger. Landing now."

The black vessel went down by night unnoticed by any of the people of earth just a few miles in front of Weskerbourow. The night hid the alien spacecraft and a new lifeform entered the soil of earth for the first time.
15321.title: POV of our Alien

153212.content:
5722, Sheala with her civilian name, could not wait to stretch her legs. Her enironmental spacesuit clung to her body like a second skin. It was the newest generation of all environemnt protection armor and it did a good job so far. She was still alive. That is proof enough. The black, dimly shining material did not impair her movements at all. It stretched and tightened with everything she did. Actually she could only feelt it if really concentrating.

For the last time she checked her gear and loaded her blaster before tucking it into her utility belt. My story of the downfall of men begins in 1908. The people where very busy and technology was on the move. Factories who spew black smoke into the air raised like mushrooms on a wet summerday in the woods and men became hasty.

It is friday evening and I was on my way home. The tram was full, like every day at this time. I a man I knew from a pub and we talked for a while before he left the filled cabine. I had to wait another ten minutes until I arrived at my destination. I lived in the outskirts of the city and here and there I stopped to greet someone or simply nodded to neighbors. Two kids playing ball on the street and I kicked it back as it came in my direction. I was not a good soccer player and so I missed my target by far. they chuckled but I didn't mind. I knew of this mine weaknes.

It smelled good as I was in front of my door. I opened it to be greeted by my two kids Charly and Lara, five and 3 years old. My wife was setting the table already. "Hi honey", she greeted me and gave me a passionate kiss while my kids still watched. It was an uneventful evening with some talking after we brought the kids to bed. Nothing special at all. Nothing that warned from the immediate danger that was right above us. The rats and hares acted strange and a small line was giving record to it in the newspaper but people put it away as a vermin problem rather than the beginning of the apocalypse.

Edit: 2/5/18
I’ll be adding an “alt stories” option somewhere
in which size stories, movies, episodes of shows/cartoons/anime
can play out slightly different or ideally have an alternative ending or keep ongoing from what happened in cannon
Also if possible please cite or note sources where it may be needed.



Also here’s a reminder of the rules and story description

Like most other Giantess Stories but with a Twist... What's the twist you ask? Hopefully a different character set using characters seldom used.

Rules:

1> Giantesses ONLY NO MALE GIANTS

2> NO Scat, toilet stuff or the like

3> NO Forced or Forced Sudden Endings

4> Leave AS MANY STORY-LINE Options Open AS POSSIBLE

5 > Girl X Girl Or Girl X Guy is fine! NO Guy X Guy

6 > I Reserve the right to add to/edit/modify the above rules or ANY Additions to the story

7> Continuous or Endless growth is allowable! If chosen KEEP THE STORY GOING AND DO NOT END IT! If the giantess outgrows solar system/universe she will simply grow into another ( Think Multi-Verse type scenario )

7B> In Endless growth Scenario Giantess can ONLY Be hurt/Killed by bigger giantess and the growth MUST Somehow transfer to another Giantess or Female thus continuing/beginning the story line again

** Edit 10/4/13 **

I'll be editing and removing some chapters here and there! I hadn't realized I'd forgotten to be descriptive enough for what I was looking for in this story so..

EXTRA Guidelines:
Please keep the story Preferably Gentle or Gentle and mischievous day to day life with a giantess type deal with the Giantess having either

1> Been born that way in some mysterious way ( Disease, experiment etc. Use your imagination )
2> Becomes a giantess thru unusual or rarely used means ( Unique experimentation ideas, Aliens/UFO Caused it, Contracts disease alien on non alien disease, someones wish gone awry etc. again use your imagination )


Edit 12/20/15:
Please Please Please people no crazy Kaiju/Monster girl or Alien Girl stuff unless the girl in question looks 90% or more human and you don't go overboard on crazy powers this isn't Girlzilla here and the focus should be on her size, looks, personality , thoughts/reactions to her size etc. the rest to me serves as a distraction and there's plenty o other stories out there for it!
