15531.title: ALT Choice continues- reserved )

choices: The start of Lisa’s New Life ( reserved )
155311.content:
Chapter 1 - Epilogue or Prologue?

Characters - Family

Lisa Porter - Main Character
Age 14 1/2
Normal Height 4 FT 1
Normal weight - 90 pounds.
Eyes -Green
Hair - Brownish
Bust/Breast - Nearly non existent



Sarah Porter
Age 21
Height 5 ft 5
Eyes- Green
Hair - Brown but dyed Blonde -
Bust - D cups
Relations - 1 of Lisa’s older siblings, currently attending college and has a boyfriend


Nancy aka Nan Porter
Age 24
Height 5 ft 9
Eyes- Blue
Hair - Red -
Bust - F cups
Relations - 1 of Lisa’s older siblings, married with 2 children ages 6 and 4


Sally Porter
Age 6
Eyes- Green
Hair - Brown
Relations - Nancy’s daughter and Niece to the other siblings.

Annie Porter
Age 4
Eyes- Green
Hair - Blonde -
Relations - Nancy’s other daughter

Chris Porter
Age 21
Height 5 ft 11
Eyes- Green
Hair - Red -
Relations - 1 of Lisa’s older siblings and Sarah’s Twin


Maria Porter
Deceased mother to the siblings

Timothy Porter
Deceased father to the siblings.

———————

Lisa Porter was for the most part a once
normal 14 year old girl save a few things.


Lisa was short and slightly underweight for her age,
always had been.

Lisa was also underdeveloped or a late bloomer.
She had interest in boys, knew the birds and bees,
and of course had periods and stimuli that came with maturity.


Sadly tho she feared Mother Nature hated her seeing as
she was nearly flat as a board, hadn’t
gotten the height boost or other promises
of puberty to any meaningful degree.


If there were a puberty fairy she sure wonders
what she had done to piss it off or repel it.


Another Unique thing to Lisa besides her story
is her living situation.

Her parents had died 4 years ago in a tragic
and horrific accident involving a drunk driver,
a semi and a tour bus.
Dozens of lives were lost because of some idiot
on a drunken road rage bender resulting in
as the cops called it a tragic chain reaction.


The accident ended in a series of crashes that
sent Lisa’s parents car and a tour bus off of
a bridge and into a ravine.

The tour bus had rolled over and landed inches from
her parents car however a light pole was knocked down taking out the pole on the opposite side of the highway.

In the pitch dark a semi had little time to react.
It screeched to a halt but it was too late.

The tour bus driver had climbed out his drivers windows
then lept to safety moments before the semi crashed
into the tour bus sending it and the Porter’s car thru a
guardrail and into a ravine.
The only small solace to the Porter family was
the parents had been knocked unconscious according to traffic cams after the drunk had sent them into the guardrail.


The tour bus and car had both exploded at the bottom of the ravine.
The drunk driver was caught and charged the maximum.


The D.O.T. , The Tour Bus Co and Trucking Co
each paid out a settlement to the Porter family
fortunately the porters were also fairly well off.

The Porter children didn’t even know their parents
had a small wealth until their death.
Their parents were nerds and worked a lot for a couple of
tech companies.

Apparently they had a few decent patents
and some good stock and bonds options.
Their mom and dad had planned ahead.

Apparently they had fully funded college funds
for each of their kids and when their estate and assets
were liquidated and turned to cash per their will
a trust survival account for the children to live off of
was set up the parents having left their children
just shy of $25 million to hopefully last all 4
long enough till they all including Lisa
could either marry or otherwise support themselves


The will appointed a money manager trustee to be paid
a modest fee out of the 24 point 93 mill
and make sure the Porter children lived frugally.
Instructions also have said Trustee
Power over each child’s college fund which
2 other Lisa’s elder siblings had tapped.


Her big sister Sarah was in school currently
to become a doctor. It exceeded her college fund
fortunately Nancy had offered up her excess funds seeing
as Nancy the eldest had went the cheaper route
of community college for beauty school.
She did hair, makeup and nails. She wasn’t famous but
she did okay before meeting her husband a doctor.


Lisa had also made the mature selfless choice to
kick her college fund over to Sarah on of all things
the promise that any future doctor care Lisa needed would
be free on her so long as her studies and training
would allow.


Their brother Chris on the other hand was
going the entertainment route studying music
and acting. He didn’t plan to be super famous
but he did have reasonable ambition and goals.


Back to Lisa she was the oddball of the family in some
ways. It was her living situation that was unique.
She lived alone at age 14 in her family’s house.

The family just couldn’t bring themselves to give it up.
Now of course some ground rules were set for
Lisa. Fortunately the Porter’s neighbors had been
mostly good folk and offered to help.


The Peterson’s and the Mossfield’s would help with
some yard work, check in on Lisa and small stuff like that.
only Tina Peterson the bitchy teen next door had a problem with Lisa. She bullied her and excluded her from her clique.
Tina could never understand how they could allow a
14 year old to live alone especially one so
fashionably challenged, nerdy, short and plain.



Fortunately Dr. John Peterson had also volunteered to be
Lisa’s primary care physician.
He had been friends with her parents for a fair number of years and owed them in a few ways including some bets
he lost but fully intended to make good on.


One such lost bet was that Lisa was gonna be
born Lennord. Needless to say both John and
Timothy were shocked when Lisa was born.
Chris wasn’t exactly thrilled to have yet another girl
in the house either being the only boy besides his dad.
At that age for Chris it was like
“Yuck more cooties”


The Porters lived in a small often unheard of
community.
Little Ridge, New York.
155311.title: So it begins - My Version - Reserved

1553111.content:
Chapter 2: 1 Fateful Night


Lisa was a nice girl albeit shy.
Her few friends called her cross between
shy, introverted and a Tsundere.
She was pretty smart, and fairly attractive despite
her shortcomings.



Lisa wasn’t great at socializing however
to break her of that her school had pushed her to join a
club or group so she was a backup member of
their school academic decathlon team.


The team was headed back on a bus from competing
with a school 2 counties over.
It was a Friday night and unfortunately history was
about to repeat itself sort of. It was raining.


A drunk driver sped alongside the bus.


“God damned drunk drivers! Don’t they ever fuckin learn”
Hissed the school bus driver.


Suddenly the drunk cut off the bus and lost control.
The drunk hydroplaned into a ditch.
The school bus jerked , skidded, hydroplaned then
rolled over a few times.



Most of the students, the driver and 2 teachers had died.
Lisa woke up with a bump and cuts and bruises minutes later.


The highway was unfortunately empty as can be.
Lisa struggled out of her seat.
She would of stopped to take in the horrors before her
but her eyes caught 2 things.



The bus was on fire despite the rain and there was a puddle of gasoline getting larger.
Lisa as quick as she could got out.


She then saw something hurtling towards the ground.
A meteorite landed in a ditch next to the highway.
She watched as the meteor exploded open.
An object got hurled out of the blast zone.



Suddenly something round the size of a gumball shot into
her mouth.
She was forced to swallow nearly choking.
Seconds later her stomach felt unsettled.
Pain shot throughout her body and she could’ve sworn
a light shone out of her mouth briefly as she screamed in agony.

Suddenly she couldn’t breath and she slipped into
unconsciousness.


A lone car came down the highway going the opposite direction of Lisa’s bus.
The car came to a halt spotting the crash.
The driver put the 4 ways on and hopped out of the car
Cell phone in hand.


It was an 17 year old that looked like a football jock
however he was anything but.

He got on the phone fast and jumped the highway barrier.

“Hello Tri County 9-1-1 whats your Emergency”


“Yes I’m out on highway Interstate 2033 and I came
across a couple bad accidents. There’s a school bus on fire”

He pulled people out of the bus then the car.

He was panicked then he spotted
Lisa. She was cute but looked young.

“Ok calm down sir can you give us a location or mile
marker number?”

“I-I’m not sure it-it’s about 3 3/4 Miles from the
Garlinsburg exit. I I found a passenger that looks like she was ejected from 1 of the wrecks. She’s blue and barely breathing. I’m going to rush her to the hospital”

“Sir please we advise you don’t do that”

“I’m not letting her die damn it! She looks like a child and I know for a fact Emergency Services are at least
25 Minutes away. The rain has stopped and I know I can get her help faster. Just please send help to the crash site”


He hung up and lifted up the girl.
She was remarkably light like 80 pounds maybe.
He put her in the back seat then
sped off.


16 Minutes later he arrived at the nearest hospital.
He rushed into the emergency department.

“Quick this girl she needs help”


“What happened?” Asked the medical staff
rushing to get her into a gurney.


“I dunno everything. I was on the interstate.
there was no traffic then I came up to a crash!
I think she was ejected from 1 of the vehicles.
I called 9-1-1 and helped others out of the vehicles
but they were too far off. I think most folks died but she seemed still alive but critical condition. I rushed her here”


“We’ll take it from here then. The intake specialist will ask a few more questions”


A lady approached.
“Hi I’m Bethany the intake specialist.
I need to know as much info as you can give me.
Now then name”

“Uhh Michael... Michael Grail”

“Oh my god the Michael Grail? Like the inherited
Trillions youngest and richest person on the planet
Gail?”

“Uhh yea”

“Oh my gosh I’m sorry about your parents
but we will take extra good care of your daughter.
That Erin K Gail wing of the medical center has been a godsend”

“Uhh thanks but she’s not my daughter”

“Oh? Please don’t tell me you’re one of those cradle
robbing rich playboys!”


“No I just saved her from the scene of an accident”

Suddenly in popped the local Sheriff.


“I’ll be damned that 9-1-1 dispatcher wasn’t crazy
We’ve been graced by the presence of a member of the
Gail family the new family head no less!
You may not remember me but I’m
Sheriff Brigsby
Your mother helped expand our police department.
We are so glad to be one of the community’s your
family’s philanthropy has touched”


“Oh hey yea I think mom and grandma brought me to your policeman’s ball.”


“Yep they sure did. Boy have you grown in 7 years
but I’m sure your parents rest their souls would be super
proud of you now. Anyway I heard you tried to save a girls
life. I swear you remind me of your mothers side of
the Gail family. It’s funny since your ma saved your pops
life back in the day”


“Uhhh thanks”
1553111.title: The start of Lisa’s New Life ( reserved )

15531111.content:
Chapter 3 - Diagonosis and Prognosis


Lisa. came to and blinked to clear her vision.
The overhead fluorescent lights were dazzling.
Lights? She shivered again, and rubbed at
her eyes with her hand.



Lisa’s eyes snapped open.
She looked at her hand, then at her surroundings.
She was in a small, white-painted room
decorated with glass-door cabinets
and anatomical charts and pictures.
A thin white sheet was pulled over her.
Lisa peered under the sheet and found she was only dressed in a thin hospital gown.



"You’re awake," a voice said. She looked toward the voice and saw a man looking around the door frame.


"Hey, doc," he called. "She’s awake."

Lisa felt her throat.
Her memory was a blur but she remembered
feeling like she was choking on something before she
passed out.


Then a realization hit her as a woman
dressed in a sweatsuit and a white
doctor’s coat strode into the room.


"I’m Doctor Sparago," she began.
“You’re in the Gailton Medical Center.
Can you tell me your name?”


“I-I umm I’m not sure”


“I feared as much” sighed the doctor.


“Do you know your age or remember anything at all”



“Umm I’m not sure. I think I’m 14 and I vaguely remember
being in the dark in pain then waking up here”



“As we feared. You have a mild concussion
but you also seem to have amnesia”


“Do you hurt still anywhere?”

“Yeah my head”

“That’s to be expected. You were quite lucky”

Lisa stared at her bare feet, visible
below the sheet covering her.
She couldn’t dismiss the feeling that
they looked different somehow.
Despite this amnesia she felt like something was
off and different about her body.



"May I come in?"
Lisa looked up a man no a teenager walk
into the room to the foot of her bed.


"You look better than the first time I saw you," he said.

Lisa wasn’t sure why but she blushed taking it as
a compliment. She also noted how cute and handsome
he was.

“Who are you?”

She noted his features Framed by straight
dark brown hair, his face was
regular save for a nose that looked just
one size too large. His brown eyes were
warm, sharp and intelligent.
His body was slim yet build in a shapeless
plaid shirt and chinos that bore the muddy
evidence of a recent mishap.


He looked like a geek or nerd had fused with
Prince Charming and a football jock.
He seemed only a few years older than herself.
He followed her eyes and looked down
at the dirt and stains on his clothes.


“Right this young lad here helped save you”
said the doctor
“If you ask me he’s a real fox. If it weren’t for
the age differences between you two I’d
totally suggest you date him after this ordeal”


They both blushed this time then he introduced
himself.
“I’m Michael. Michael Gail. Sorry that we aren’t
meeting under better circumstances”


“Anyway darling I’m afraid to say you were in a
terrible traffic accident”


He moved to shake her hand.
Lisa didn’t pull her hand out of his grasp.
His hands were large and warm,
like his eyes.
She found herself momentarily
forgetting the frightening experience
she had—how long ago was it? Or her current one.



She didn’t wanna admit it but there was something
about him even tho they had just met.


"What time is it?" she asked.


"It’s just after nine," Michael answered.
His voice was deep and musical.
She blinked and smiled again.


"Thank you for helping me," she said. Michael nodded.


"You’re welcome. It’s not every day I get a
chance to help a pretty girl on the road."


Lisa looked at his hand holding hers,
then up at his face. His features were
handsome, his expression open and honest.
He was very attractive, she thought.


What was she thinking. He’s older, they just met
and despite that Baka’s compliment she knew
she wasn’t what boys would consider
“attractive”
It was an empty meaningless lie of a compliment.


"Ahem," Dr. Sparago suddenly said.
Both Lisa and Michael looked at her,
Michael releasing Lisa’s hand.
Both teens blushed again.


"Well, you were lucky," the doctor said shortly.
"Good thing Romeo here found you and
got you here fast! Aside from your apparent amnesia
and the minor head injury I detect no other injury. I don’t think you need to go remain in the hospital."



Lisa. realized her clothes and belongings
were nowhere to be seen.


"Your clothes were soaked," Sparago said,
anticipating her next question.
She gestured to Michael.


“Mr. Gail here has already spoken to
the police about the accident."


"I told them where it was," Michael added.
"They said they would come to see you
in the morning after you regained consciousness”



“You’ve been out for a few days.
It’s Tuesday in case you were wondering.
We imagine that someone might be looking for you
alas with your amnesia and the fact that the bus you
were on exploded and the occupants being tricky
to identify you and Mr Gail have a tricky road ahead”


Just then the Sheriff popped in.

“Ah I see the patient is awake.
I’ll keep my promise to wait to talk to her but
seeing as she can’t remain in the hospital
and we have neither a shelter, orphanage or
Child Services nearby I think Mr Carter should take
care of her for now”


“Hey just because she’s cute doesn’t mean I
Know how to take care of a kid!
Besides I was going to offer that anyway
for a day or 2 at my family’s vacation house”


That kid comment stung Lisa for some reason.

“You stupid jerk! I’m not gonna say thank you”
Lisa said with a pout that
Michael oddly found cute.


“That’s fine but for that jerk comment
You can make your own breakfast in the morning”

“Ha the lovebirds already get along well.
I have a strange yet special feeling about you
two” said the doctor.


“Anyway without taking a jab at your size
or age deary aside from your injuries
if you haven’t already I suggest a follow up with
another doctor possibly a specialist.
You appear to be a bit on the petit and I’d be remiss
as a doctor if I weren’t concerned.
You may be strong willed, and an unusually quick
healer but that’s still a health concern.”


“Also I’ve detected some unusual hormone
levels in you that should probably be monitored”
15531111.title: CH 2 reserved

155311111.content:
Chapter 4 - Guesthouse

The next morning Michael arrived to take Lisa
to his vacation home.
Lisa was still fuming about the comments and
jibes to her size and age last night which were a few
too many for her tastes.



They got in his car and Lisa had to admit she was
impressed. It was a nice cherry red and
although she knew little about cars it looked fast
and expensive.


They drove for a bit.
Michael pulled up his GPS.


He saw her look confused.
I’m using it to trace my route back to my family’s vacation
home. We don’t use it often anymore."


"You don’t live around here?"
Lisa asked. Michael shook his head.
"North Carolina. A friend of mine lives
up around Lake Placid and invited me
up for a week. Turns out it was a ploy to try and
set me up with some chick who’s not my type.”



“A lot of my friends think I’m weird but I only
like either really tall girls or really short petite ones.”


Lisa blushed and her eyes went wide at that last part.

“Average girls are overrated.
Tall ones have their perks and short petite girls
tend to be cuter for some reason”

Lisa blushed again.

“So what ended up happening?”


“Well somehow the jerk ended up sleeping with
2 girls including the one he was gonna set me up with
then he got in a fight with one of their exes.
I got outta there not needing that drama”


Lisa suddenly felt an odd sense of vertigo but tried to
ignore it.
It passed as quickly as it came.


“Anyway I was gonna go visit someone else then
head back home to Polk County, North Carolina
when I happened upon a bad traffic accident caused
by some douchebag drunk.
Upon inspection of the accident scene I found
a very cute girl that looked like she had been
thrown from a vehicle”


Another blush from Lisa.
There he’s goes with the cute talk again.
They drove for 20 some more minutes in silence.


Finally the rolled up to a small mansion like estate.
Lisa was shocked and impressed.


“Oh my god your family must be loaded”



“I guess you could say that”


“Explains why you’re a bit of a jerk”


“Hey now not all rich folk are bad or stuck up
and at least I’m no Jeff Bezos”


“You mean bald and under pays workers?
I guess that’s a plus for you not being like that then”


“Anyway this is where you’ll be staying for a couple of days.
I’ll take the liberty of getting you some better clothes
later unfortunately I didn’t know your size
and the gift shop only had novelty stuff”


“Eh at least the shirt says
Honk if you like living healthy. I’m sure there’s worse shirts”


Michael got Lisa settled in then they had breakfast.
Pancakes, Waffles, eggs, sausage, toast and bacon.
Michael was shocked by how much Lisa ate.


“Wow considering the your size and the doctor
mentioning I’m shocked you can sure put it away”


Lisa blushed. “You jerk are you calling me a short pig”


“Maybe maybe not”

“Grrr! Humph I bet that girl wouldn’t have stayed with
a jerk like you for very long anyway!
For someone who’s rich you sure have poor manners
towards girls”


“Maybe only towards the cute ones”


Lisa blushed again.


“Idiot why do you keep calling me cute?! I’m not cute”



“Well that’s your opinion perhaps.
Anyways if you were closer to my age but still
just as short I’d probably consider that old doctors
idea of dating you”


Another blush from Lisa.

“And what makes you think I’d date an idiot or
a mean jerk like you”


“Well for one this mean jerk rescued a cute girl”


Just then a butler appeared.
“Ah Master Gail I’m so sorry I wasn’t here to greet you.
I wasn’t expecting this visit so soon”

He was tall, old, with a mustache pretty much your cliche
butler.

“Ah and this must be the young lady I’ve heard about.
Young master was right you are quite cute and
you seem to bring out a different side of him.
Pleasure to meet you the name is Richard Jives
at your service young miss”


“Shut it Jives I’m not treating shorty any differently
than any other girl I’ve only met 5 days ago”


“Mind your manners young master.
Your mother and father would be disappointed”


“Anyway Jives here functions as
caretaker and butler.
He also has taken care of me a
large portion of my life
alongside our maid who now lives at my
ranch and mansion I was telling you about earlier
in Polk County North Carolina.”



Just then another wave of vertigo struck Lisa.
It passes quickly again.



Next Michael goes to shower.
He suggested she do the same.


Lisa grimaced as he moved past her
towards the bathroom and shut the door behind him.
Lisa followed and stopped for a moment
by the bathroom door.
She heard the jingle of his belt being
undone, blushed again, and continued
down the hall to the next bathroom.



Turning on a light, she retrieved a bathrobe from
the closet just as Michael suddenly began
singing Home on the Range. She listened for a
moment and was impressed--he actually knew more than the first stanza of the song.


Lisa felt another wave of vertigo.
She sat on the toilet to steady herself
and get her wits
back about her.


Lisa wasn’t sure why but her clothes
felt tighter for some odd reason.
She went to take them off and noticed that
her center of gravity felt off somehow.


Lisa then proceeded to the shower.
The shower went mostly normal until Lisa got
to her chest.
As she brushed against her nipples
a stronger than normal jolt of pleasure went thru her.
She gasped then shook it off.


Another discovery soon follows.
She was always nearly completely flat but
something felt strange.

She stopped and brought her hands to her chest.
There still weren’t full on boobs there but the
14 year old was in utter shock.


“W-what the? Do do I actually bumps developing?
That’s impossible”
Still there was no denying her chest was
less flat and childlike than it had been a week ago.


Lisa felt a mix of shock, fear, jubilation,
joy, and worry.
She quickly finished her shower after
getting over the shock.



Lisa is getting dressed again when Michael
barges in.

“Hey you almost...” he stops

Lisa blushes angry.
“You perverted Idiot get out”
She throws a shampoo bottle at him as he leaves.
It hits him in the back of the head.


“Ouch you’ve got a hell of arm”
He says outside as she fumes.


They spend much of the day talking.
They eat lunch prepared by Jives
They watched some movies.
They ate dinner again made by Jives.


Over dinner Lisa gets another bout of vertigo.
Lisa is later shown to an impressive guest room.
155311111.title: Chapter 3 - Reserved

1553111111.content:
Chapter 5 - Sleepless Night


Lisa struggled to sleep.
She wasn’t sure why but she had a mix of
anxiousness, and too much energy.


There was also the occasional bout of unexplained
Virtego.

It was around 3am Thursday morning
according to the digital clock in the guest room.


Suddenly something hit her.
Her memory started to return.
The accident, her name and more.


She dashed to Michael’s room.
She rushed inside.

“Michael! Michael wake up”

He grumbled then woke up.

He looked at his unwelcome nighttime visitor
as he struggled to shake the sleep in his eyes.


“Michael my memory it’s back”

He was only half listeninig.
Sleep gone and lights on he notices that
his guest forgot a few important details when she
bathed in.

1 - Lisa was in only her panties.
2 - He was completely in the buff
3 - She was every bit as cute as he thought
4 - There was a stiffness forming that he
couldn’t control.


Oblivious she continues.
“Michael did you hear me? My memory is back.”

“That’s great an all but didn’t you forget something?”

“Like what? Now get outta bed”
She pulls off the covers and blushed getting a shocking
view of Michael in the buff”

It’s his turn to blush.

“W-what the heck?! Why are you not wearing anything”

“Like you should talk”
Lisa looks at herself then blushed.

“P-pervert!”

“You’re the one that barged in at 320 in the morning
nearly undressed”


Lisa hated to admit it but he had a valid point.
There was also the fact Michael was
cute, well built and. She mentally slapped herself
No he’s a jerk and too old!


The 2 of them got dressed and sat in Michael’s bedroom.
There was silence and tension before Michael broke it.

“So you said you remembered?”


“Yea.. unfortunately...”

“Okay then let’s here it”

“Well my name is Lisa Porter.
I live alone in Little Ridge, New York.
I might not look as you and others are keen to
point out but I’m a little over 14 1/2 years old”


“What really? Dang”

“What?”

“I was just thinking that means if we hit it
off so to speak you’d be just old enough to date or
marry back home”

Lisa blushed again.

“Anyway why didn’t you want your memory back?”


Lisa delved into her past, her parents deaths,
the parts about being bullied, picked on, short etc.


“Well for what it’s worth I genuinely think you’re
cute and a good person if not slightly ill tempered”


Lisa blushed then pouted.


“That pout is super cute too”

“But I’m not cute! What guy could ever like a
flat chested, short, plain, uninteresting, girl like me”


“I told you yesterday I like short girls!
I also told you are cute”

To prove his point Michael bent down and shocked
Lisa by giving her a kiss on the lips.
He shocked himself too.


Lisa froze as he spoke eyes wide.

“I told you you’re cute.
After hearing your story you’re certainly NOT
Plain, nor uninteresting in fact we actually share some
interests.
Also as far as chests go I also find big
chested girls unpleasant nothing wrong
with flat small or medium chests!”


Lisa was listening but yet still in shock over
the kiss. Her hand went to her lips.
He-he kissed me. My first real kiss from a guy
she thought.


“B-Baka” she said half heartedly punching his
chest.

In truth both had trouble admitting they were
falling for the other.
Another wave of vertigo hits Lisa.


The next day Friday
The Sheriff comes and talks with Lisa.
They inform her that she should return home.

Michael volunteered to do it.
Friday night he takes her home.
She insisted he stay the night.
It was a bad idea seeing as the pair gave into

Michael had taken her virginity that night

Another couple waves Of vertigo hit that night.

15531111111.content:
Chapter 6: Problems Part 1

Lisa sat up in bed, raising her knees
and wrapping her arms around her legs,
dragging the bedclothes off Michael
in the process. He sat up on his elbows.
Lisa turned away from him so he couldn’t
see the anxiety she felt.


I can’t NOT tell him, not anymore.
I can’t mislead him. I have to tell him
what’s happening to me. He’ll probably get
scared and leave when he sees how
I’ve changed, how much I’ve grown.
When he hears I’m still growing.
God knows it’s scaring me.


Lisa came to a sudden stark realization
that struck her forcibly.


I don’t want to be alone.
I don’t want to face what happening
to me alone. I don’t know how to deal with
these changes in my body. I keep changing
and I don’t know what to do. But I can’t keep
it from him any longer.


Lisa abruptly left the bed and straightened until
she was her full height--whatever that was --
She estimated 5 foot by now and faced Michael.


"Michael, I’m not sure how to tell you this,"
she began, and hesitated. Michael lay where he was, puzzlement and concern etching his features.


"Michael," she said
"I like you so far. Please know that."

"Lisa, sweetheart, I love you, too.
What is it? Is--is it another--?"


Lisa burst into a fit of giggling at the emotion in his voice. He obviously struggled to control his features, and she covered her mouth with her hand to stop her laughter.


“No it’s not another guy. I told you not
one single guy until you has shown ANY
Sort of interest in me.”


Michael visibly relaxed, but his puzzled
expression returned.


“Michael something incredible is
happening to me," Lisa said softly.
“Ever since the accident there been
something wrong with me. I think this is
gonna sound crazy but”


Michael raised an eyebrow.

“But something happened to me at the crash site.
When I was up against the something landed
near the highway like a meteorite.
It exploded and something round flew into my
mouth. I remember choking on an unknown round
object. I know it sounds crazy”


Michael looked at Lisa incredulous but allowed
her to continue.


“I think I was forced to swallow it.
I felt strange after, then pain then blacked out.
What it did, I don’t know. All I remember l
is it sent some kind of a shock into me
that paralyzed me. I couldn’t breath and I hurt
And now, it’s affecting my body.
It’s--well, let me show you."



Lisa reached out and turned on
the nightstand light once more,
then straightened and looked at Michael.
He smiled as he admired her cute petite form.


"Now, stand here next to me," she said.


"Okay," Michael replied, a touch of
humor in his voice as he stood erect
and began to walk around the bed towards her.
His smile faded slightly and the
puzzled look returned to his face.
He noticed where Lisa’s Head was.


“Michael how tall are you?"


"Six feet,Three" he replied.


“Lisa, you do look a little different--"


"I’m growing, Michael . My body is growing
bigger with every moment that passes."


“Well of course you’re growing you are
You’re a teenager after”


“No you don’t get it Michael listen and think
and look hard.
Remember I told that the puberty fairy
practically sees me as a no fly zone.
Remember I told you that I’m 4 Foot 1.
Remember that I told you I’ve barely grown an
inch since I was 8.”


Michael had mixed feelings where this was
going.

“Remember that my chest was practically
nonexistent.”

Michael looked here up and down.
It was starting to dawn on him.

“I’m--I’m scared. I don’t understand what’s
happening to me. On one hand I like it but... Oh!"


Michael grasped Lisa’s arms as she
suffered another dizzy spell.
She closed her eyes and cursed with
the effort to shake it off.


"I think I just had another growth spurt,"
she said. She gripped his arms to steady
herself. "I keep having these attacks of vertigo.
They started when I was at the hospital.”



Michael eyed the cutie he was falling for.


“I think that every time I feel dizzy my
body is spurting up." Her eyes misted over.

“Oh, God, Michael , what am I going to do?
I’m scared it’s never going to stop!"
Tears began to roll down Lisa’s cheeks.


Michael stood before her, his face
totally blank, jaw dropped in shock.
He must be completely dumbfounded by
what she had told him.



God, she thought, panic rising inside
her, he doesn’t believe me.
He must think I’m some kind of crackpot.
Please, I don’t want to be alone,
I don’t want him to leave--


Michael closed his mouth with an
audible snap. The smile returned to
his face, slowly. He put his arms around
her and hugged her until she found it hard
to breathe.


“My little cutie” he whispered in her ear.
"I believe you. I don’t understand it, either,
but I know you’re telling the truth."


Lisa began to sob. Michael released
his hold on her and took up her hands.


"I thought something was funny.
After we’d made love I thought I felt
something here."

He moved one of her hands to her breast.


"I thought maybe it was my imagination
playing tricks on me, but I would have sworn
your chest was bigger under my hand.
Like the lumps were moving.
And now that I look you’re just shy of A cups
I’m no world-class stud so I doubted that
your blossoming was due solely to my skill--"


“Baka you stupid pervert you would
Notice that. What happened to
I like small girls without big chests”
Lisa huffed then playfully punched him.


“Hey you’re the one that pointed it out.
Also given how cute you are I’m not necessarily
opposed to the breasts as long as those things
don’t turn into lethal knockeds and you’re still you”


“Jerk”

“Tsundere cutie”

-blush-

“Idiot”


“As you say, you were 4 foot one until tonight.
Now you’re not. Well, Lisa--" He hesitated.


"I have a confession of my own to make.
Remember I also told you I liked tall girls.
There’s a reason for that too!
When I was a younger I fantasized about
making love to giant women. I haven’t
thought about my fantasies in years, but
you are bringing them back to me.
You were beautiful and cute before, but
you’re more beautiful now.
So, you’re stuck with me whether you like it or not."


There was a pause.
“If anything you’re more perfect for me now
than you were before.
If you end up super tall that’s just a bonus.
If you shrink back or stay this size that’s fine too.
I told you during our make out that
you are unequivocally the 1st girl I’ve ever
truly fallen for, the 1st girl that being with makes
me feel calm and like all is right in the world”

“Baka we just met 8 days ago”
Lisa said blushing.

The restaurant wasn’t as bad but again

Her tips went straight to the rest of the staff.
Business at her restaurant though was boomin.


When asked her reasons mom would say her goal
her dreams and her desire were to see and
make people happy doing the things she loved.
Those things mom loved just so happened to
be cooking, sewing, crafts, and floral arranging.”

Lisa was incredulous.
Michael’s mom sounded perfect.
How could she compare and why did
she feel she wanted or needed to compare.


“Anyway Lisa call me crazy but like I said

You may be a bit brash, hot headed and
the class Tsundere from the anime we’ve both

, strong willed, strong minded, mostly honest
and a survivor.”


Lisa blushed again.
“I-I’m not that great and..and should we really
be wasting time on story time like this?”


“Right I almost forgot my new girlfriend has
a not so small dilemma”


Lisa blushed
“Wh-who said I was your girlfriend idiot?”


“Well do you have any better offers?”


Lisa looked shocked.
“W-well I I err uhh”

“Relax I wasn’t expecting a solid answer right
away. Anyway we can hash out our relationship
later right now I figure as you’ve apparently grown
again I might have to gift you some new clothes”


Lisa looked down and realized her clothes
had finally bit the dust a 1 Foot plus height gain being
too much especially as another wave of vertigo hits.

Michael’s eyes bug out a bit but he recovers.
Lisa was now eye level with his kneck.

“I uhh”

“Relax Lisa it’s pretty obvious that your clothes

I do however have a suggestion to get you to

Lisa looked at Michael curious what he was
planning. He went to the hall and came back

a pair of her sandles.


“Tada there we go. It fits and gives you a

“Well yea think about. It’s 525 am on

Exactly how many stores are open that you think

Granted my idea is to claim we were at a

Lisa was shocked.

“Y-you really thought this thru”


“Hey being an heir to a wealthy family

Lisa was shocked she could hear the conversation.

The call ended.

A woman in her 40s greeted them.

She appeared to be Asian or Japanese.
She had black hair.

Chapter 9: Thoughts


Lisa woke up suddenly.
She inhaled deeply, and blinked
in the darkness. A soft snoring
reassured her that Michael was still there.
She rose slowly so as not to disturb him
and padded softly out of the room, feeling
her way in the dark for the bathroom.



When her hand found the bathroom doorknob
she halted, struck by a sudden thought.
She turned to face the door.
Reaching inside, she found the light switch,
and light flooded out of the room.
Lisa choked. She was now as tall as the top
of the door. She looked down at herself
and muffled her soft cry. Her body had
expanded even more.



Lisa’s new breasts were still barely A Cups
though. She wasn’t concerned.
She actually shared Michael’s Wish from
the other day that they not become mellons or
“knockers” as he called them.



Lisa felt unnaturally clumsy and unsure as
she entered the room and closed the door.
Lisa left the bathroom and walked down the
hallway towards the living room,
moving slowly. Sure enough, she found
the edge of her couch in fewer steps than she was accustomed to. She went to the windows
and pulled open the curtains.
It was just beginning to become light,
and she could see that it was still cloudy
outside. The windowpane was cold and
damp to the touch.


It’s still happening. I’m still
growing, and growing, and growing.
I must be seven feet tall now.
How big will I be tonight?
Tomorrow morning?
The day after?
Michael may get his fifty-foot fantasy girl
after all. God, I hope I come up to his fantasy.
If I don’t I hope we can still get along.
What if I grow so big I hurt him?
I don’t ever want to hurt him.
Why does he have me thinking like this?
That perverted Baka!


Another spasm of vertigo hit her.
She imagined she could almost feel the
effect this time--a strange subtle slipping
sensation under her skin, the feeling of
shifting inside her body. She covered her
breasts with her hands, pressing, weighing.
Mostly pressing and feeling her budding breasts.


My adolescent fantasies have come to life, too.
Finally something equivalent to puberty is
happening to me Lisa Porter of all people.
It’s nice but yet part of me wants it to stop.
At this rate I fear it might not tho.



Lisa left the curtains open and settled on her couch,
shaking her head as her new weight made its
springs creak.


Well, Michael, I really hope you do like big girls,
‘cause I think I’m becoming the
biggest girl ever.
I dunno how big I’m going to get if this
keeps up but I hope you stick with me.
I hate to admit it to even myself but these 9
days with you have been so great.

155311111111111.content:
Chapter 10: Things Start Taking A Turn


Michael woke with a start and squinted
in the dim light to see his surroundings.
He first inspected his wristwatch: it was 547 a.m.
Looking to his right, he found he was the
only occupant in
Lisa’s bed. His features tightening, Michael
flung himself erect, the bedclothes
nearly tripping him. He pulled the bedsheet
loose, wrapped it around himself and
walked swiftly to the living room.


It was lighter in the living room,
courtesy of the partially uncurtained
Windows. Lisa lay across her couch,
legs trailing off the cushions, hands
nested under her cheek. She looked
very pretty and cute asleep--a small half-smile
decorating her features, her hair partially
hiding her ear, the soft sighing of her
breathing, her bathrobe in charmingly
open disarray. Michael felt a surge in his
affection and love for her. He bent
down and gently kissed her on the lips.
Her eyelids fluttered, and he felt her smile
under his lips. He kissed her again and
her eyes opened.


"Hi," he said softly.


"Hi," she replied. She unfolded one
hand and rubbed his stubble and unruly hair.


"You look a mess," she said impishly. Michael grinned.


"Afraid so. How did you sleep?"


Lisa sighed. "Not very well. I kept waking up…"
Her eyes snapped wide open, and Lisa rose.
As she stood upright she gasped and
covered her mouth with her hands.


"Oh, God!" she exclaimed.


Lisa had to look down to see Michael fully.
The top of his head appeared level with
her chin. She looked down at herself.


"It’s still happening," she cried. "I’m still growing."


Lisa turned and stubbed her toe on
the leg of the endtable beside the couch.
She stumbled, hissing in pain, then picked
herself up and limped to her
bedroom, Michael following.
Lisa stopped and bent at the knees
before her mirror to view herself in the glass.
A small, frightened sound escaped her lips
as she saw her image--she had expanded so much she almost didn't recognize herself.



She had gone from barely bumps on her chest
to beginners boobs as her schoolmates would
call girls with A cups.
Her torso had lengthened.
Her legs were impossibly long,
as were her arms. Even her face had
changed, her jawline longer, her cheeks broader.
Her hands-- Lisa had raised them to her face--
were longer than before, less dainty with long nails.



Her hair fell thickly down her front nearly
to her nipples. She saw Michael’s image in one
corner of the mirror and turned to face him


"Michael, what am I going to do?"
she asked plaintively.


“It kept waking me up during the night.
Every time I woke up I thought my body
growing was a bad dream. Sometimes
I thought I could almost feel the changes
happening inside me. What am I going to do?"


"I don’t know, Lisa," Michael answered.
“What is happening to you is totally unique.
I-I just don’t know-- I wish I did though."


Lisa suddenly gasped and fell to her
haunches, reaching out to steady herself.
Michael nearly lost his makeshift toga
rushing to her side.


"It’s all right, I’m okay, all right," she muttered
after several deep breaths.


"God, it’s still happening.
Look, I need to get help for this."


Michael nodded, gripping her hand
and helping her to a seat on her bed.


"But, who?" he asked.


"I can only think of one person to start," she replied.


Dr. John Peterson sat at the kitchenette
in his home, dressed in terry
pajamas, his breakfast of toast and coffee
cooling before him as he began his usual
Sunday routine of losing himself in the
morning paper.
He was an early riser thanks in part to
his chosen
profession He was about to turn the first
page of his New York Times when
one of the two wall-mounted phones in the kitchen rang.


Dr. John Peterson looked up.
It was the patient phone.
He let it ring the four times necessary
for the answering machine to activate.
Thirty seconds to let the message run, and then the machine began to record.


"Doctor Peterson, I need to see you right away.”

A female voice, young and obviously
frightened, to judge from the tremulous tones.


“It’s Lisa, Lisa Porter."
Maria and Timothy’s little girl?
A fine couple -- their passing over a year ago
was a great shame.
She knows better than to try to make an
appointment on a Sunday.

The doctor was so annoyed and still sleepy
that something had yet to click.


"Doctor, I know this is going to sound
impossible, but I-I’ve been--I was in
a traffic accident last week, and ever since
then I-I’ve been experiencing these growth
spurts. Look--"


John left his stool and grabbed up the phone.


"Lisa? it’s John Peterson”



"Oh, Doctor, thank God.
Please let me come to see you today”


“Lisa are you okay? You’ve been missing for days
and there’s been this strange car at your house
a couple times. We even took a missing
persons report out on you”


“Never mind that Call it off! Anyway these
growth spurts are more pressing”


"What is this about ‘growth spurts’?"



"I think that when you see me you’ll understand.
Can I come to your office?"


John looked at the clock.

“How’s about 745am and I’ll let the
Police know you’ve been located”


“Good we’ll be right over.”

He pulled the receiver from his ear as the
dial tone returned.

"Dear?" John’s wife, Margaret, in nightgown
and down-at-heel slippers, padded into the kitchen.


"Who was that?"

“It was Lisa she’s no longer missing but
apparently she needs a doctor. It sounds urgent.
I’m afraid I have to go into the clinic”



Later John finished knotting his bow tie
when he heard the sound of a large car or
truck pulling into the slim macadam parking
area next to his office. He slipped into his loafers
and tweed jacket and strode to the walkway
connecting his home and office.
He turned the latch on the office door and
switched on the lights.
He hurried back into the reception desk,
pausing when he heard a knock.
155311111111111.title: Ch 8 reserved

1553111111111111.content:
Chapter 11: Red Flags Part 1


"Come in, it’s open,"
he called out as he stepped behind
the desk to the large steel file cabinet.



He pulled open one drawer, grunting
with the effort, and flipped through the
color-coded folders, when a gust of cold air
and a rattle told him his hurried visitor had arrived.


"Doctor?" he heard Lisa say behind him.
Ah, here was her file. John turned.
"Now, Miss Porter, what is--"


Doctor Porter stopped in mid-sentence
as he looked up at the tallest,
most statuesque teenager he had ever seen,
wearing Lisa's face.



Her clothing was unusual-- a bedsheet turned into
a makeshift toga. She wore sandals
instead of shoes, and what looked like two pairs of white socks each on her feet.
Beside her he saw a young man,
a stranger, well dressed but unshave
and uncombed, who was holding her hand.



Peterson stared, then recovered and cleared his throat.


"Please excuse me," he said. "I’m afraid I haven’t seen you for a while, Lisa even before you disappeared--"

Doctor Peterson stopped again, shaking his head.


"I’m sorry," he blurted. "I’m--here, step into room two."
John led the way to Examination Room 2.
He managed to refrain from looking over
his shoulder at the couple in his wake.



He quickly looked in her folder as
she ducked under the doorjamb to
enter the examination room.
At Peterson’s gesture she sat on the leather
couch in its center. She settled herself.
John noticed her toes touched the floor,
even sitting on a four-foot high couch--
and felt for the young man's hand again.


John flipped through the
folder, looked at Lisa, glanced at the young man,
and then looked in the folder again.

"'Growth spurts', you said?" he spoke.

"Lisa—please forgive me. I'm afraid you have me at something of a loss."


"You should try it from my end, doctor,"
she replied, asperity in her voice.


John looked up, put down the folder, clapped his hands together and threw off his bemusement.

"All right, young man--"

“Michael”


“Michael please wait outside."
Michael squeezed Lisa's hand
and smiled reassuringly.
Peterson closed the door behind
him, seized his stethoscope and began
to examine his patient.


A quick check of pulse, temperature
and blood pressure, then Peterson
palpated the glands under her jaw, looked
down her throat, and into her eyes and ears.


He pressed the stethoscope to her chest
and back, nodding at the result.
"Please remove your err uhh clothes
and lie down on the table,"
he said, reaching to snap the footrest into place.


Lisa complied, elbowing herself up as high
as possible on the couch. Peterson blinked.
Even with her head level with the edge of
the table, her lower legs still overhung the couch.
She wore no bra on this visit presumably due to
her small chest.


He cleared his throat again, and continued.
"Have you been eating all right?
Any illness lately?
That's fine. Any pain here? Here? Good.
Had any problems sleeping?
Are you exercising at all?
I'm going to remove your footwear here.
What, none of your shoes fit?
Hmmm. Reflexes are fine.
Okay, you can put your shirt on. Come over here."


Peterson led Lisa to the platform scale in
the corner of the room.
She stepped onto the plate,
and he adjusted the weights, cautioning
her to keep still. After a moment's fiddling
the scale bar gauge achieved equilibrium
and Peterson seized her record to note the result.


"One Hundred One Point Five Pounds," he muttered.
He began to draw up the height scale,
then looked up at Lisa

.
"Please put this atop your head," he said.


Lisa pulled the bar up until it stopped--
just below her eye level.
Peterson looked at the measure.
It had stopped at its limit of seven feet.
He looked up at his large, trembling visitor.


"Well, I'd say you are seven feet,
five or six inches tall,"
he said, blowing out his cheeks.


A soft clank caught his ear.
The weight gauge had gone off balance.


Peterson tapped the ounce-measure
weight until the gauge was centered
and read her weight again. Muttering under
his breath, he scratched out the one measure
and wrote the new one when the weight
gauge flickered into motion.
John watched as the point of the gauge
slowly rose until it clanked against its upper
stop again. Lisa had put her hands to her mouth, her expression a mixture of horror and fascination.
1553111111111111.title: Ch 9 reserved

15531111111111111.content:
Chapter 12: Red Flags Part 2


"Well, now," Peterson said.
He adjusted the ounce-weight on
the gauge again, then looked at his watch.
One minute fifteen seconds later the gauge
again came to rest against its upper stop--and Lisa had stayed completely still the entire time.


"Well," he said again. "Well."



"I want you admitted to the hospital immediately,"
he announced. He sat behind his cluttered desk,



Lisa and Michael occupying the two chairs before him.



"I need more tests done," he continued.
He could not keep anxiety out of his voice.


"Without them I certainly can't commit to a
diagnosis of your condition.
What your body is doing is a physical
impossibility. The amount of--look at it this
way: a teenager can use up a thousand
calories a day just in normal daily growth
and will grow, say, six inches in a year.
9 tops if lucky!
I know that last September you were
4 feet 1 tall, and now you're
close to 7 and a half at least.



You say this all started 9 days ago
, after your accident at night Last Friday,
was it? You've grown over 2 feet in just over 8 days
That's one million, eight hundred twenty five thousand calories--two million calories in growth alone--.
You should be burning up from all that energy expenditure, but your temperature is two-tenths of a degree above normal.


Your pulse rate and blood pressure are a
little high, but not high enough--you body
should be racing like a car engine.
You ate a normal dinner last night and
nothing this morning; your current growth
rate should've required over a ton of food to
sustain it. I can go on describing your condition,
but I can't explain it at all. More tests should help get a handle on what's happening to you.


On top of everything you don’t know what it was
that you may have swallowed and I don’t
have a stomach scope here for that.


Vassar Brothers Hospital in
Poughkeepsie in the closest,"
he said.


"My trip computer is getting more of a
workout than I had anticipated,"
Michael said as he kept one eye on his
laptop's display while driving down
Route 115, heading towards Poughkeepsie
and the hospital. Despite her seat being
set as far back as it would go
Lisa was still required to twist sideways
to fit herself in Michael’s car.


She hunched over, her back towards
Michael, shifting in her seat every few minutes
or so. Michael noticed that makeshift toga had
become less useful than earlier.


"Still, I don't mind hanging around here,"
Michael continued.
Lisa looked over her shoulder at him and smiled.
She slipped further down in the seat and pulled at
the makeshift toga.

“Thanks pervert But is it because I’m
giving you free peaks?”


“No that’s just a bonus”

“Pervert”

“Tsundere Princess”

He was interrupted by a slight tearing sound.

“Oww fuck” hissed Lisa.


“Are you Okay?”

“God, Michael , it's so weird.
I can feel my clothes getting tighter and
tighter on my body. I was trying not to burst out
of the your little disguise. Sorry I wasn't too talkative."


"Don't worry about it, Lisa," Michael replied.
He allowed himself to glance up and down her
cute petite yet larger frame.


She shifted in her seat again.
Michael tore his eyes away from her form
and concentrated on finding his way to the
hospital Doctor Peterson had recommended.


Doctor Peterson fumbled with
various items and began to flip through the
bulky rolodex on his desk.
A moment's search and he found the
telephone number he sought. He dialed it
too fast the first time, and got no connection.



He swore and tried again.
This time he finally connected,
after what seemed to be an interminable
number of clicks and other noises on the line.


"Centers for Disease Control," a pleasant
female voice chirped.


"Please connect me to Doctor Turner, Doctor William Turner."


"I'm sorry sir, but Doctor Turner is
not present in his office today.
May I take a message?"


"Listen, this is an emergency.
Get me in touch with Doctor Turner immediately."


"I'm sorry sir, but--"


"Are you listening to me, miss?"
John shouted.


“I have a possible situation here.
I need to speak to Doctor Turner immediately!"


Dr. Peterson was awarded by a
momentary silence, then the sound of a phone ringing.


"Hello?" a new voice said.


"Doctor Turner? My name's
Doctor John Peterson. I'm a physician in
upstate New York. I attended your conference on the analyses of the demographic diseases in
New York City last year."



"Yes, Doctor? And what can I do for you?"
Turner's voice was composed of equal parts
curiosity and annoyance. John spoke for ten
minutes, then hung up the phone,
put on his coat, and left his office.
His wife did not see him leave, else she
would have asked him why he was perspiring so freely on such a cold day.



Vassar Brothers Hospital was a surprisingly small, modern structure bordering Route 9.
15531111111111111.title: Ch 9 reserved

155311111111111111.content:
Chapter 13: Red Flags Part III

Vassar Brothers Hospital was a surprisingly small, modern structure bordering Route 9.

Michael came to a stop in an empty
parking space near what looked to be the
front entrance of the structure.
He shut off the cars engine and
leaned back in his seat, peering out the windows.
It was a beautiful day, sunny and breezy.
He allowed himself a few seconds to drink in
the sunshine shining in the car, then turned to
the passenger beside him.


Lisa had found it necessary to contort her body to stay within the confines of the car during the
sixty-minute journey to the hospital.


Her lengthening legs butted her knees
against the passenger door and caused
her buttocks to slide partially out of the seat.
Her back was curved to keep her head
from pressing against the ceiling panel,
hands pressed against the dashboard to steady her.



She turned to face Michael, her expression sad.

"Michael , I really think you should reconsider
your promise to me," she said.


“I'm going to be a bi--a burden on everybody.
You've been so nice--"


He interrupted her pity fest.
“Lisa I told you I’m drawn to”

Her eyes went wide and she blushed.


“I also told you I like small girls or big.
You’re becoming the latter.
It’s also like I told Edna yesterday.
I like you for you.
If it wasn’t clear before Lisa Porter
You could be 100 feet tall with 3 eyes,
4 arms, a tail and purple skin and I’d still like you”


“I don't want to let anything make you unhappy--"



"Then leave me. Go back home to North Carolina,
find a-a normal-sized girl, get married,
have ten kids, and live forever.
Forget about me. I keep thinking about Dr. Peterson’s reaction to me.
I'm scaring people just because of my size--and I'm still growing." She gestured to her makeshift toga.



Michael remained silent for a moment,
looking at her. Tears started to form in her eyes.
He reached out to stroke her chin.


"Now who’s being the idiot between us?
Do you really want me to leave?" he asked quietly.
A teardrop fell into his hand.


"No," she said, taking his hand in hers
and kissing it--it was still as warm as
she remembered but now it wasn't so big in
her own hands anymore.


“No, I never want you to leave me.
I'm afraid for you, Michael.
What if I never stop growing?
Will you love me when I'm so big
you can't reach my waist? My ankle?
What if my growing starts to--to weaken me--"



"We'll cross each of those bridges as we come to them,
Lisa. Together."


Lisa’s shoulders drooped a bit.


"I'll tell you something," Michael continued.
“It’s a strange feeling, but I can't help thinking
that we were destined to come together.
Call it fate, luck, karma, I'm not sure why,
but I knew the instant I saw you that, well,
that we were supposed to be together,
That you were supposed to live, to survive that
wreck and survive any turmoil or hardships you face.



If it's intimacy you're worried about, well,
what we had the other night was wonderful
for me--I hope for you also--and
I think if we put our imaginations to work
on it, we can still enjoy one another.


If we can’t then we’ll figure out an alternative.
There’s more to a relationship than sex
and you are a great girl I’m beyond glad I’m
getting to know”


Lisa made an exasperated sound.

"Can't get rid of you, even for your own good?"



"This is for my own good," Michael insisted.
He unbuckled himself, opened his door
and circled the car. Whipping off his coat,
he opened the passenger
door for Lisa, leaned inside, and kissed
her briefly while wrapping his coat across
her shoulders. Lisa unfolded her legs and bent nearly double to exit the car, then stood erect.



The all-too-familiar flutter in her chest staged another comeback as she noted that
Michael’s head now looked level
with her adam's apple.


"You'd think I'd begin to get used to this," she muttered.


Michael shut the door and turned to face
her. His eyes were just above her chest.
He peered up at Lisa, waggled his
eyebrows and grinned.


"Well, there are some advantages," he said.


“Pervert”

“Tsundere”

“Idiot”

“My big cutie”

“You know it”


It was dim and much warmer in the
vestibule of the hospital.
Michael walked Lisa into the deserted
space and looked about for a waiting area
when three people, a man and two
women, converged on them.


Michael and Lisa looked both curious
at them--they all were dressed in surgical
gowns, hats and masks, and wore gloves
on their hands.


"Miz Porter?" one of the women asked.

Lisa nodded.


"I'm Doctor Schulman. Doctor Peterson called.
We are preparing a room for you right away.
If you'll follow me, we'll see you get set up
and then arrange for the tests Doctor Peterson ordered."
Lisa was surprised, and showed it.



“Please pardon our appearance,"
Schulman continued as she led Lisa,
Michael and the other two down the hall towards the elevators.


"It's just a precaution. Now, the first thing
we need to do is get some basic information
from you, then we'll start with some
x-rays and bloodwork."


Lisa ducked into the elevator, the
others following. She noticed that Michael was
looking stern and even distressed, but she could not immediately fathom why. She also noted that
the elevator seemed reserved for
them--the gowned man used a key to operate it.


"How long have you had this condition, Miz Porter?"
Doctor Schulman suddenly asked.


"It began earlier this," Lisa answered shortly.

"Do you feel any weakness? And dizziness?"


"Weakness, no. I've been having dizzy spells, though."


Suddenly one of the side seams of Lisa’s
makeshift toga gave out. The ripping sound
was loud in the confines of the elevator.
She quickly wrapped her arms under her chest in consternation, her face and neck flushing deeply.


"Jesus Christ," the gowned man said,
eyes above his mask boggling at Lisa’s visible
change as she breathed.
Michael looked even more stern,
then looked up at Lisa and rubbed her arm for a moment.


Michael clearly didn’t like where this was
going and seemed very concerned Lisa noted.
155311111111111111.title: Ch 10 reserved

1553111111111111111.content:
Chapter 14: Private Ward?


“Charlie," Schulman snapped.
The man came out of his trance and
rushed to turn his key in its slot, stopping
the elevator. Schulman led the way out of
the lift onto the hospital floor.
Lisa saw several signs on the wall opposite
the elevator bearing boldly printed instructions
to any staff entering the floor.



"Right over here, Miz Porter, please,"
Doctor Schulman said, pointing to an open
door on the floor. Lisa bent under the doorframe
and entered the room. It contained two beds,
which had been butted end-to-end and apparently bolted together.



"Well, it'll have nice scenery, at least,"
Michael mused--some kind soul had the
presence of mind to turn the beds in the room
so that the foot of the bed faced the one window,
allowing Lisa a view of buildings opposite the hospital and, in the distance, the Hudson River.


"Okay, Miz Porter, why don't you settle yourself.
Kathy, did you get the admittance forms?"
The other gowned female produced a
clipboard bearing several pieces of paper
like a magician. She handed the board and
a pen to Lisa.
Lisa did not fail to notice that she
stayed at arm's length and stepped
away once Lisa took the clipboard.
Out of the corner of her eye she noticed
the amusement in Michael’s expression.



"Please fill these out for us," Schulman continued.
Lisa flipped through the forms.

"I'm afraid I don't have my purse, Doctor,"
she said. She felt an attack of vertigo and
swayed slightly.

"I-I guess I didn’t think to bring it."


"Oh, don't worry about the section
on insurance right now," Schulman answered.


"You can get that information for us
later if we need it. Right now you need to
get settled so we can start the tests."


As if by some hidden cue, Doctor Schulman
and the others spontaneously turned and
exited the room. Lisa peered at the papers on the
clipboard, and sighed.


"Well, well," Michael said.
“Leading an interesting life is interesting, indeed."


He moved quickly to close the door. Lisa dropped the clipboard on the double bed and seated herself, wincing.


“I gotta get out of this tattered thing”

She was referring to the torn sheet she’d been wearing.
She managed to get it off and Michael
ogled at her body.


It felt good to be free of the restraint of her
makeshift clothes, and Lisa rubbed her arms
and belly in appreciation. She straightened and looked
down. She’d grown so much from the short girl
that had once been a frequent bully magnet or
target of teasing.


Now short jokes about her would be ridiculous.


She tossed her hair--it had grown down below
her shoulder blades--and pulled her bangs
behind her ears, then bent over to rub some
circulation back into her legs.


"Wow," she heard Michael’s voice say. She looked up.
Michael stood beside the door, staring at her.
His eyes were as big as Charlie's had been.
She turned so that he could not see her front and looked over her shoulder.


“Pervert”

“Hey you’re the one that disrobed with me
in the room or say I say dis-toga’d”

“That joke was lame”

“Lame but accurate”

“Baka”

“But your Baka right?”

“Hnn I guess so”


Lisa reached out to the hospital gown neatly
folded atop the bed and shook it
out, thrust her arms into its sleeve holes, then flipped her hair across her front.


"You'd think a nurse would have stayed
in here to help me," she said. Michael shook his head.


"I suspect they're drawing lots right now to see who'll be taking care of you."


"I am scary, then?" she asked.


"Not to me," he replied, his expression slightly annoyed.
Lisa felt contrite.


"Here, help me put this on," she gestured.
Michael came up behind her and
began to tie the cloth strings dangling
from the battens on the gown.
He tied first the bottom, then the top,
then he began to rub her back between her
shoulder blades.


"You're cute and a beautiful person, Lisa," he said.


"Even now?" she asked.
Michael stopped rubbing her back, then slipped both his arms through the gap in her gown and circled her waist.



“Even now," he replied.
He raised his hands to her breasts and
caressed them gently, tickling her nipples.
Lisa felt herself respond immediately,
her tiny breasts engorging, her nipples
becoming erect.
She sucked in a deep breath,
felt for his hands through the thin fabric of the gown and began to massage her breasts with him.
"Mmmm," she murmured. "That feels good."


Michael started kissing her on the base of
her neck, then down between her shoulder
blades, his hands still working her bosom.
Lisa arched her back, thrusting her small breasts
into his hands. He pressed harder, his fingers
rubbing her areolas. Lisa moaned softly in response.
She could feel her crotch becoming warm.



A sudden creaking noise penetrated the room.
Someone was opening the door. Michael
hands vanished from under her gown
as fast as lightening lest he get caught with his
hands in the cookie jar so to speak.


Lisa gulped and made a show of holding
up the shoulders of the gown as she felt
Michael pulling tight the middle set of cords.
They both turned as one to see a
nurse, garbed in a similar fashion to the l
first three they met, with a large
tray hanging from her arm.
She stopped at the threshold and looked at
Lisa and Michael. Her eyes were wide.


“H-Hello," she said.
"I'm here to take some blood samples."
1553111111111111111.title: Ch 11 reserved

15531111111111111111.content:
Chapter 15: Like Taking Blood From An Amazon


The next few hours went by.
Lisa was punctured repeatedly by lab
technicians taking what seemed
like quarts of blood. She was then
transferred to a gurney that was too small for her
burgeoning body--her knees stuck absurdly
into the air, covered by a thin sheet which flapped revealingly in the breeze of her passage from
one location to another--and taken back down
the elevator to the radiology department, where
she was X-rayed, then put onto the moving exam
table of an MRI unit. Thirty minutes later found
her back in her room, surrounded by a bevy of
overdressed technicians who wired her to a half dozen electronic machines.




For nearly a half-hour flickering screens and
a cacophony of beeps, chirps and warbles
surrounded her. All the staff were hesitant to
come near her, although some of them seemed
sympathetic to her condition, as her growth
continued unabated. Michael stuck by her whenever
possible, holding her hand, reassuring her.
By one in the afternoon Lisa became resistant towards
the staff.


“How much more blood do you people need?"
she snapped.
The technician, sampling syringe in hand, paused.


"I'm sorry, ma'am," he replied. "Orders."


"I'd better be able to live without all this,"
Lisa muttered, raising her arm.
Michael grinned and winked at Lisa
then put on a stern face.



"You'd do better with some food,"
he said loudly. One of the nurses
crowded beside her bed--a solid
woman whose graying hair was visible
in her plastic cap--made a clucking noise.



"You've had nothing to eat today, dear?"
Lisa shook her head. Her motion caused
her to shift in the grip of the lab technician,
jiggling the needle in her arm
She spit in pain and gave the technician a
withering look. He paled and jumped back, leaving the syringe behind. Ellie yanked it out of her arm.


"Here," she said to the technician. "I think you've had enough for today, don't you?"


The technician gingerly picked the bloody
needle from her hand. The older nurse stepped
forward and elbowed the technician aside.


“Harry, what's the matter with you," she growled.


“You'd think you've never drawn blood
from a patient before."


"You've got to be kidding, Miss Johnson,"
the technician replied. Johnson seized a damp
swab and dabbed the puncture on
Lisa’s arm, barking orders as she did so.



"Harry, leave the kit here.
You and Paul take the samples down to the lab.
Maria, call the kitchen.
Arrange for some food to be sent up here.
Make sure it's normal diet.
You can tell Mr. Gonzalez that I ordered
it and if he doesn't like it he can talk to me.”



She paused a moment.
“I think the patient can do with a little rest, too."
Johnson folded Lisa’s arm up and glared at
the rest of the group standing numbly beside her bed.



"I trust everybody here understands english?"
she snapped. The group scattered out the door.
Johnson turned back to Lisa, unfolded her arm and
removed the bloodied swab. She fished in the kit for a bandage.


“There, dear," she said, her eyes smiling
above her mask.


“I think you've been very patient with us,
but we are trying to help you.
You just need to be a little more patient, okay? Good."


Lisa seized Johnson's gloved hand.
"Thank you," she said.


Michael nodded. Johnson patted Lisa’s hand and,
retrieving the lab kit, left the room, closing the door
behind her.
15531111111111111111.title: Ch 12 reserved

155311111111111111111.content:
Chapter 16: Isolation

Lisa’s doze was interrupted by the sound of jingling.
She opened her eyes to see
Michael trying various keys in the
lock of the door leading to an adjacent room.



"Michael, what are you doing?"


"Trying to find a way out of here," he answered.


"Find a way out of here?
Do you mean we're locked in this room?"


"No, no. But that Charlie guy who met u
downstairs is guarding the door. I saw him
hanging around in the hall, trying to stay out of sight."


"Why? Why would they guard my door?"


Michael stopped fiddling with the
lock and came to Lisa’s bedside.
He took up her hand--she was startled
by just how small his hand felt in hers--and squeezed.



"We're in an isolation ward," he said.
“Those instructions on the wall we saw
when we arrived on this floor are standard
policy for dealing with contagious infections.
Presumably they think that what happening to
you is infectious, and that I'm infected as well.
That's why they've let me stay with you as long as
I have--I'm right where they want me to be.
I know that's not true, but they don't.
So, there's someone on the door to keep me here."



"What about me?" Lisa asked.


Michael motioned with his hands.
"Stand up," he said.


“Okay. I've grown into my gown again, anyway.”

Lisa sat upright in the bed, and Michael reached
across the mattress to tie the straps of her hospital
gown more loosely, as he had done twice before.


Lisa hitched up the second gown she was using as a wraparound skirt, and stood. Her head bumped
the ceiling, and she bent in the middle to save her neck being broken.


"Michael," she said. He nodded.


"I'm afraid so, Lisa . They think you're too
big to be able to leave freely if your own will"


“I hate to admit they’re right. This is insane how big
I’ve grown and even my boobs are now mid A Range.”


“I'll find a way, once they clear you," he replied.

Lisa recognized a strain in his voice
despite his outward levity.


"I don't think they will let me go, Mike," Lisa said softly.


“I'm so damned big and it's not stopping.
I shouldn’t even be able to stand up at this
size. All my blood should have rushed into my
legs and made me pass out.
You know, it's funny, but aside from being
so big and tall I've never felt better in my life.
I feel like I could lift up a locomotive."


Michael looked concerned, then nodded.
"What's happening to you is truly remarkable, Lisa.
I just don't know if others will see it the same way."


He clapped his hands together.
"First things first, though."



"Who gave you a set of hospital keys?"
Lisa asked. She stepped across the room
to look over his shoulder.
Michael looked up at her, an impish expression
on his face.

"Charlie--but he doesn't know it, yet."


"You picked his pocket?"


Michael inclined his head.

“Yep. Did it while we were exiting the elevator.
It was easy. He was too busy staring at you."

"Michael!"

“Hey that’s what the idiot gets for ogling my
girlfriend. Anyway you’d be surprised the skills
I picked up at my early college attendance.
When I was due to attend a really boring
lecture I'd stand at the door and exchange
the contents of other people's pockets without
their noticing. Made classes a lot more interesting.
One of my best friends from childhood had a
father who was a reformed thief. Taught us both
everything he knew. By the time I was fifteen I
was criminally proficient."


"You went to college?"

"Yep. Ah hah! Like I told you one has to
be smart to be an heir to a wealthy family’s
businesses. I hate to brag but for better or worse
I was bred and raised for it”


Lisa heard the door lock click. Michael slowly
pulled the door open, peeking around the edge of the doorframe.

"Good," he said.
"Nobody in the next room. Lisa, I'll be right
back to you. I promise."



Michael slipped through the door.
"Michael, wait! Don't…" Lisa heard him lock
it from the other side. Concerned, she listened
intently for sounds that would
indicate Michael’s transgression had been
detected, but heard only silence.
She squatted to ease her bent back,
then stretched her arms. It felt good to move
her body freely. A sudden looseness in the
middle of her gown told her that the tieback
keeping her gown closed across her chest
and back had broken.




She looked down under each arm
then at her chest. Sure enough, the gown
was pulled forward against her small bust,
broadening the gap at her back, her breasts
pressing against the thin cotton of the gown
revealingly. She would soon need another
gown to help cover her torso.


Lisa stretched her back until her bones popped,
then each leg, hitching up her makeshift skirt to
prevent it tearing.


Lisa became increasingly nervous as time
went by. It seemed like an hour since Michael
had snuck from the room. Anyone entering to
see her or perform another test would
immediately detect his absence and
spread an alarm.
When she heard a soft jingling and saw
the side door open again she was first relieved,
then greatly alarmed.
A doctor wearing surgical greens and a
mask poked his head around the door.
When he saw only Lisa sitting on her bed,
he pulled away the mask, grinned and waved 4 large, heavily loaded paper bags at her.



"Michael!"


“Who else? These surgical getups are great.
Nobody even asked me who I was.
Anybody show up while I was gone?"


"No. You took a chance, Michael, sneaking out like that.


"Not really." Michael grabbed the serving table from the corner of the room and wheeled it towards her bed.



"Remember Nurse Johnson said you were
to get some rest, and she sounds like the person
who would enforce an order like that.
It's midafternoon so the hospital cafeteria kitchen
is closed--I checked on the way out--and no
one was likely to suddenly arrive with food,
so the odds were good you'd be undisturbed
by any visitors for a while. Anyway I was
hungry and as I understand it my growing
girlfriend is probably starving by now.



Rumor has it she theoretically requires
2 million calories or so they say”

He added the last part with a dig at the doctors.

“Oh you! You’re something else”

“So I’ve been told”
155311111111111111111.title: Chapter 13 Reserved

1553111111111111111111.content:
Chapter 17: Mealtime Get Your Grub On


Michael quickly stripped off his disguise and
placed the bags on the table. Lisa sniffed the
aromas coming from the bags and her mouth
watered. Michael opened each bag and
presented each item to her with a flourish.


"Hamburgers, Hot Dogs, Pizza or club sandwiches?"
he asked.

“You missed breakfast, so I figured I better bring
a double helping of each for you."


Lisa laughed--and grabbed for some grub.
She ate quickly while Michael opened a cold
2-liter bottle of soda for her and a smaller one
for himself. She ate the hamburgers in two bites,
ignoring how petite each looked. Next she ate a
couple of Hot Dogs also in 2 bites apiece.


Michael bit into a club sandwich. Lisa finished both
sets of fries and started on the untouched club sandwich, finishing her meal in a few minutes. Next she ate 3
slices of pizza, both soft pretzels with cheese sauce
and bowl of cottage cheese.


“I guess you were a little more hungry than you thought,"
he said.

Lisa grinned sheepishly.

“Hey like the doctors said and you already knew
I’m a growing girl and plus I haven’t had anything
since last nights petite dinner”


“Keep that up and you’ll be less petite”


“Are you calling me fat or a pig? You jerk”


“I’m the jerk that brought you a meal also you
ate my fries and didn’t leave me a pretzel”



“Hmmph that’s what you get for being a jerk”


“Hnn women. Give em everything and bring em
food and they still can’t show a little appreciation”


Lisa while insulted had to admit given the circumstances
and her hogging the food and his risk taking that she
indeed could’ve shown a little more gratitude.

"It was very good. Thank you," she replied, bending
down to kiss him on the cheek.

There was a pause.
“And I’m sorry I took some of the food you wanted.
there’s still some slices of pizza, and 1 Hot Dog left
if you want it? I call dibs on that Tuna Salad Sandwich
and the fruit cup though”


“You’re welcome, apologies accepted,
I’ll take one of those slices of pizza and the hot dog.
The rest is yours my growing cutie and beauty”


Lisa blushed.

“Aww my hero.” She said then kissed him again.
She then took another slice of pizza and finished it
in 3 bites.


“For hospital food this stuff isn’t that bad”
Michael added eating his hot dog as Lisa chugged her
soda.


“Sooo is Charlie still outside” she asked
starting on the last slice of pizza that wasn’t claimed
and saving the other for Michael.


“Let me go look” he said standing up.

As he did so and as Lisa ate the pizza another
wave of vertigo hit.

“Whoa. That one was strong”


“Another spell?”

“Yea. That one felt bigger. I haven’t noticed but
I don’t think the frequency or amount is the consistently
the same every time”


“Hmm that’s interesting to know”


“So about Charlie is he still there?”

“Yes and no. Charlie is gone which is good for
him since I still kinda wanna punch him for eyeing
my girl”

Lisa blushed. Then took a bite of her Tuna sandwich.
at her size it was really only 2 bites to finish it.


“Anyway it’s not Charlie it’s somebody else.
Looks like round-the-clock surveillance for both of us.
I keep wondering when they're going to try to grab me."

“Grab you?”


“Yep. There was quite a gaggle of doctors and
other folks at the end of the hall when I came
back upstairs. I couldn't get close enough to
hear what they were saying but they were pointing
this way. From the x-rays they were holding I suppose
they got your tests back and they're pretty excited about them."


There was a pause and he noted their food still
left.


“Listen I think we should finish the food quickly
and then dispose of the evidence before the come
and bust us.”


Lisa nodded and chugged her fruit cup the whole
chunks of fruit seemingly not bothering her.
Michael finished his hot dog then ripped off a chunk
of pizza.


“Here you eat it. I’m not knocking your appetite
but you’d finish this faster than I can and I hate
to waste good food”

Lisa did so. Michael gathered the trash and
pitched it in the room next door.
Just in good time too.
He returned with unpleasant news.

“I heard them from the other room. They’re getting
even more antsy over your results”


“Maybe they found a cause for my growing?"
Lisa said. Michael shrugged.


"Or, they just found a lot more questions to ask."


"Did you see Doctor Peterson at all?"


"Nope. Not a bit. I have the feeling that he might
be one of our neighbors pretty soon here, too."
1553111111111111111111.title: Chapter 14

15531111111111111111111.content:
Chapter 18: A Promise And A Melting Heart


Lisa could not dispel a sense of
dread at Michael’s words. He was
half-turned towards the main door to the
room, his arms crossed. She saw his jaw
tighten, and his hand clench into a fist.
He exhaled gustily, then turned to face
her, his expression clear.


"Well, we'll see what happens.
Somebody should show up soon to reveal
the results of your tests."


Lisa reached out suddenly with her arms.
"Michael, please hold me," she said.

“Wha--of course," he replied.
He came within the circle of her arms and
