She felt her breath catch in her throat and
her heart began pounding in her chest.
Michael remained where he was beside
her knee, his face earnest, a sparkling golden
circle inside the box he held over his head.




The entire semicircle of people froze in utter
shock for a moment, then just as
suddenly came to life.
Everyone jumped to their feet and a
storm of applause rattled the windows.


"Bravo, bravo!"


"You go, girl!"


"Mazeltov! Mazeltov!"



“Holy--"



"Grab it! Grab it!"


“Lisa Porter, will you wear my ring?"
Michael asked.
Lisa saw a smile start to break through his
serious demeanor.
Lisa gulped, her mind reeling.
She blinked away the tears that started
to form in her eyes and a broad smile
creased her face.


"Yes!" she cried out.
"Yes, Michael Gail, I will marry you!"


She forgot dignity and caution and bent
double to fling her arms around
Michael.


Lifting him up, she hugged him tight to
her, crying and laughing at the same time,
the tears streaming down her cheeks and
soaking into his shoulders.



Lisa began to rock gently back and forth
as she held him tight to her, her sobs of
joy shaking him as he rested against
her bosom.


"Careful now, I’ll lose the box,"
he gasped in her hands.
Lisa redoubled her pressure.
She could feel the box poking her in the neck
as Michael returned her embrace.



"No,"
she cried, her tears continuing unabated.
"I’m never going to let you go."



"Good," she heard Michael say.
She felt him kiss the hollow of her throat again.



Lisa finally released him.
She grasped his torso in her hands,
brought him up to her face and kissed
him soundly, then put him down.



Michael shook his arms and slipped
out the large golden circle within the box.
She gasped again as she saw the ring.
It was a perfect circle of gold with a line of
diamonds set around either edge,
completing two circles of sparkling precious stones.



Lisa hesitantly offered her left hand and
Michael slipped the circle over her ring
finger, his hand working something on the
underside of the ring.
He winked at her, took her hand in both of his
own and held it up so the ring could be
seen by their audience.
Again they broke into applause.



Lisa resisted the urge to sweep Michael
off his feet and carry him away to their tent
immediately.
She pulled her hand out his hold to look
at the incredible ring on her finger, turning
her hand to see every angle.



She looked at Michael.
His expression was one of total bliss.
She blinked away the moisture in her
eyes and touched her fingertips to her
lips, then reached down to touch his face.



Michael kissed her palm and smiled up at her.
"Thank you, Lisa," she heard him say
through the racket.



"Thank you for saying yes."
She felt her tears rise up again.
1553111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Lisa’s New Life ch  85 -reserved-

15532.content:
From here on out we won’t focus
On the type of girl but just the set up or
Start of things to come

So 1st story line possibilities

one day, a god of size who is as bored as you drops his size note, a note book used to alter the size of mortal.

Inside it's cover, a set of rules are written:

How to use:

1. The human whose name get written in the note along with a size will get his size changed to the one written in the note.

2. This note will not take effect unless the writer has the person's face in their mind when writing his/her name. Therefore, people sharing the same name will not be affected.

3. If the duration of the size change is written within the next 10 seconds of writing the person's name and size, it will happen.

4. If a size is not specified beside a name 19 days after the name is written, then the size can not be entered anymore.

5. If a human uses the note, a god of size usually appears in front of him/her within 39 days after he/she uses the note.

6.Gods of size, the original owners of the Size Note, do not do, in principle, anything which will help or prevent the size changes in the note.

7. A god of size has no obligation to completely explain how to use the note or rules which will apply to the human who owns it unless asked.

8. The human who becomes the owner of the Size Note can ask a god of size to shrink or grow the note to an appropriate size for the owner. However, that demand can only be asked 5 times for a single person.

9. Before writing a size, the owner of the note may choose to enter a body part of the targetted person before writing a size in accordance to the part chosen.

10. If the targeted person does not possess the specified body part, the note has no effect.

11. The clothing of the targeted person won't change size with the person unless specified to do so in the note.


It's writing time!

15533143.title: Readers choice

155331431.content:
Based on an interactive that’s just a
revival or retelling of an old interactive
———————

The premise is about a device called
“The Matter Transposer”
Basically a glorified size device

——————-
Let's just say you weren't exactly
invited to the science lab at this early
hour of the day, but here you are
amongst the various tables of equipment
and chemicals. You walk on silent
toes while perspiration pools in your pores.



You're unsure how many people could be
in the building already.
There were only a handful of cars in the
parking lot when you pulled in, but that could
easily have increased to pockets full by now.




You know what you are looking for; you've
only been following its theory and progress l
for months on years under Professor Montana.
Miss Rebekah Montana, one of the
youngest, brightest physics professors
in the country, just twenty-five years old, devoted countless hours and years to this project,
and you were always thrilled to overhear any
information about it.



The unbelievable "matter transposer",
a device that could alter the size of any object or
person it contacted.
It should be here, in this very college laboratory.
Through your piecing together of the puzzle,
the physics of the invention remained unclear,
but every partial hint gave the suggestion
that it is real and that it will work. And there it is!


Resembling sketches the professor failed
to hide from your observant
inspections, the matter transposer rests
on a nearby lab table like any other
ordinary piece of equipment.
How could she leave such a wonder
exposed like this!
Good fortune or fate, it waits for you,
calling you forward.



You stand a moment in awe of what the
oddly small device could do. Any of your
fantasies could be transferred to reality
with this simple, size-changing machine.



The matter transposer presents itself
as a compact, silvery cylinder with several
lights and a miniature display.
A round dial gives the impression of controlling
the power and direction, while a short
handle and trigger creates a
pistol-like form factor.
You take it into your hands.
155331431.title: Transposer ( basically size ray device )

1553314311.content:
With the transposer firmly in hand, you point it at different objects in the room but don't pull the trigger. You glance over the device's parts once again and twist the knob towards what you expect is growth then back towards shrink. An uncertain apprehension stirs inside as you struggle to decide how to manage this first test. The brief clues you've picked up on left you without proof of the matter transposer's actual strength.

You leave the dial slightly towards the reduction setting and aim at a scale on an adjacent table. As you pull the trigger, a slight hum vibrates through the device before a wave of light ripples through the air, engulfing the instrument on contact. The scale is aglow, swallowed by light as a radiant silhouette against the ordinary tabletop, then instant as a switch, the light flicks off and the scale is left half its former size.

"Incredible," the only word your awed breath can whisper as you approach the miniature scale. You reach out to it with tingling fingers and eyes wide with excited anticipation. You press the tiny button to activate it, and the lights come on with a cheerful beep. "And it still works!" An immeasurable smile crosses your cheeks, and you grip the matter transposer confidently. "Time to test this for real."
1553314311.title: Test it here

15533144.content:
How about this?

A young human girl is unknowingly transported
to another planet that looks exactly like Earth.
The people look human.

The only difference?
Biology and physiology!

This planet will make her feel like a real life
Alice In Wonderland.

The food, the drinks even average everyday
chemicals like hand soap or toothpaste
can cause the young human girl our
main character to shrink or grow in size.


The weather calls for size changes with
a chance of giantess sightings.

How will our little or possibly not so little
leading lady handle being the only
size changer in a world she doesn’t know
isn’t her Earth?

More Land of the BIG ( LOB )
155331444.content:
Kinda similar to the size change planet
Idea but more detailed and specific


LAND OF THE BIG

A young girl finds herself either on
a huge island or in a huge jungle near equally
huge mountains


The twists are as follows tho.

1 - The area is uninhabited by humankind
and is somehow uncharted territory to man
far far from civilization

2 - The young girl is definitely normal human
size at the start and inanimate objects
such as rocks and such are normal size
AND YET

Much but not all of The
wildlife, animals and plant life
except for insects/bugs and germs or
microorganisms
are big... really really big


In fact the smallest trees are 6 to 10x bigger than
average trees.

Flowers even seem 10 feet tall or more.


The cause is unknown and could be
mysterious mushrooms also super sized,
mysterious super sized berries,
a strange symbiotic microorganism that
affects some living creatures in mysterious ways,
Or strange dust spores


OR My preference
A strange cool lake or natural springs
who’s water while drinkable has strange
unique properties


Either way the young girl will feel small
as she survives and explores but will
hopefully soon unwittingly rise quite literally
to the top of the food chain

The choice is yours
155331444.title: More storylines plz ( reserved )

1553314441.content:
Ann was your typical average 10 year old girl once
save her unique green hair and also
her shortness and appearance.


She’d occasionally get mistaken for a
7 or 8 year old.

That soon changed though after going on
a boat trip.
She had fallen overboard and ended up
on a strange island she later learned was
uncharted.



The island looked normal until she approached
it’s center.
Plants and animals were notably bigger.
Huge in fact.

Fortunately she survived but little did Ann
realize she picked up or rather ingested
some parasitic symbiotic microorganisms.


It began the night of her rescue.
After getting the all clear from the hospital
her 16 year old big sister took her home.


Later she was ready for a bath.
As Ann approached the bathroom she
felt strange.

She’d been having these feelings at
random intervals the last day or so.


Ann shrugged it off and went into the bath.
Her sister Lin was outside concerned for
her little sis.


As Ann showered the strange feelings
returned stronger and she gasped.
She had somehow actually grown taller.



On top of that her barely there breasts
had at some point blossomed into
bonafide pair of A maybe B cups.


Lin heard some strange sounds in the
shower and called out.
“Little Sis are you ok”



She leaned against the door and listened
for a response. None came.


Ann was so stunned.
Gone was the runt of the litter, the former
shorty, the brunt of jokes at school.


Ann turned off the shower and got out.
as she opened the doors Lin fell on her back

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/10...

Both sisters were shocked.

Lin couldn’t believe what she was seeing.
Ann was stunned at 1st then dropped onto
her knees covering up tho not doing too well.


“L-L-Lin don’t look”

Lin still had a view that she didn’t particularly
need.


“Ann what happened?”

Before Ann could answer the feelings
returned again.

“No not now not again”


Lin quirked an eyebrow but the unspoken
question was answered as before her
eyes Ann’s entire body began to swell in
size in perfect proportions her chest mostly
unchanged though.

The growth lasted a couple minutes and
then stopped leaving Ann 8 feet tall.

Lin was speechless.

Ann however was quick to speak.
“Thank god they didn’t get any bigger
this time”
She said hugging her semi new B cups.


This snapped Lin out of it.

“I dunno what’s happening but it’s like
mom told me and our older sisters,
our families genetically cursed with small tits”


“That’s fine by me then cause they feel
weird”


“Well you may have grown up a bit
but you’re still you”


“I’m just glad I’m not short anymore”

info.description:
Like most other Giantess Stories but with a Twist... What's the twist you ask? Hopefully a different character set using characters seldom used.

Rules:

1> Giantesses ONLY NO MALE GIANTS

2> NO Scat, toilet stuff or the like

3> NO Forced or Forced Sudden Endings

4> Leave AS MANY STORY-LINE Options Open AS POSSIBLE

5 > Girl X Girl Or Girl X Guy is fine! NO Guy X Guy

6 > I Reserve the right to add to/edit/modify the above rules or ANY Additions to the story

7> Continuous or Endless growth is allowable! If chosen KEEP THE STORY GOING AND DO NOT END IT! If the giantess outgrows solar system/universe she will simply grow into another ( Think Multi-Verse type scenario )

7B> In Endless growth Scenario Giantess can ONLY Be hurt/Killed by bigger giantess and the growth MUST Somehow transfer to another Giantess or Female thus continuing/beginning the story line again

** Edit 10/4/13 **

I'll be editing and removing some chapters here and there! I hadn't realized I'd forgotten to be descriptive enough for what I was looking for in this story so..

EXTRA Guidelines:
Please keep the story Preferably Gentle or Gentle and mischievous day to day life with a giantess type deal with the Giantess having either

1> Been born that way in some mysterious way ( Disease, experiment etc. Use your imagination )
2> Becomes a giantess thru unusual or rarely used means ( Unique experimentation ideas, Aliens/UFO Caused it, Contracts disease alien on non alien disease, someones wish gone awry etc. again use your imagination )


Edit 12/20/15:
Please Please Please people no crazy Kaiju/Monster girl or Alien Girl stuff unless the girl in question looks 90% or more human and you don't go overboard on crazy powers this isn't Girlzilla here and the focus should be on her size, looks, personality , thoughts/reactions to her size etc. the rest to me serves as a distraction and there's plenty o other stories out there for it!


Edit: 2/5/18
I’ll be adding an “alt stories” option somewhere
in which size stories, movies, episodes of shows/cartoons/anime
can play out slightly different or ideally have an alternative ending or keep ongoing from what happened in cannon.
info.pretty_title: A Different Kind Of Giantess Story?
